TriggerGroup.name: Generic illusions
TriggerGroup.script:
--[[ This'll get infamous pretty fast. You should, of course, add your own illusions (and make sure you aren't adding something that's not an illusion!) so you fight better!
When adding illusions, make a new trigger outside of Svof, add the illusions in as trigger patterns, and give it this script: if svo.conf.aillusion then svo.ignore_illusion() end ]]

regexCodeList.string: The curse of the Aeon wears off and you return to the normal timestream.
You feel incredibly tired, and fall asleep immediately.
Your speed defence erodes away.
You are hit by a indigo, orange, and violet ray.
^\w+ stands a tarot on (?:his|her) open palm, and blows it lightly at you\. Suddenly your movement through the time stream is slowed\.$
You feel a tightening sensation grow in your lungs.
The curse of the Aeon wears off and you return to the normal timestream.
^\w+ flicks the temple of a puppet of \w+, hard\.$
return line:find(svo.me.name, 1, true) and true or false

Trigger.name: Snake bite, single aff
Trigger.script: if svo.conf.aillusion and svo.conf.ignoresinglebites then svo.ignore_snake_bite() end

regexCodeList.string: ^\w+ sinks (?:his|her) fangs into your body and you wince in pain\.$
return isPrompt()

Trigger.name: Doublestab, single aff
Trigger.script: if svo.conf.aillusion and svo.conf.ignoresinglestabs and not string.find(getLines(getLineNumber()-1, getLineNumber())[1], "^The attack rebounds back onto") then svo.ignore_illusion("Ignored the single-aff doublestab (vconfig ignoresinglestabs is on)", true) end

regexCodeList.string: ^\w+ pricks you twice in rapid succession with (?:his|her) dirk\.?$
return isPrompt()

Trigger.name: Jab, single aff
Trigger.script: if svo.conf.aillusion and svo.conf.ignoresinglestabs then svo.ignore_illusion("Ignored the single-aff doublestab (vconfig ignoresinglestabs is on)", true) end

TriggerGroup.name: svo Rift
TriggerGroup.script:
if not svo.me.parsingrift then return end -- don't know what we're parsing? we don't know what to reset then, so let's not
if svo.me.parsingrift == 'all' then for herb in pairs(svo.me.riftcontents) do svo.me.riftcontents[herb] = 0 end elseif svo.me.parsingrift == 'herb' then for _, herb in pairs(svo.me.herblist) do svo.me.riftcontents[herb] = 0 end elseif svo.me.parsingrift == 'mineral' then for _, mineral in pairs(svo.me.minerallist ) do svo.me.riftcontents[mineral] = 0 end end

regexCodeList.string: Glancing into your rift, you see:

Trigger.name: Ze work
Trigger.script:
svo.riftline() svo.prompttrigger("rift contents", function() if not getLines(getLineNumber()-1, getLineNumber())[1]:find("MORE") then local msg
if svo.me.parsingrift == 'herb' then msg = "Herb rift stats updated." elseif svo.me.parsingrift == 'mineral' then msg = "Mineral rift stats updated." elseif svo.me.parsingrift == 'all' then msg = "Herb and mineral rift stats updated." else -- nothing to say? svo.me.parsingrift = nil; return end
svo.me.parsingrift = nil
setTriggerStayOpen("svo Rift", 0) moveCursor(0, getLineNumber()-1)
if getCurrentLine() ~= '' then echo'\n' svo.echof(msg) else svo.itf(" "..msg) end
moveCursorEnd() if svo.temprift then killTrigger(svo.temprift); svo.temprift = nil end end end)

Trigger.name: No harmonics
Trigger.script: for _, harmonic in ipairs{"lament", "anthem", "harmonius", "contradanse", "paxmusicalis", "gigue", "bagatelle", "partita", "berceuse", "continuo", "wassail", "canticle", "reel", "hallelujah"} do if svo.defc[harmonic] then svo.defs["lost_"..harmonic]() end end

Trigger.name: My angel
Trigger.script:
local percent = math.floor((100/5000) * tonumber(multimatches[2][2]))
echo(string.rep(" ", 36 - #getCurrentLine()))
local width = math.floor((percent * 30) / 100) fg("a_green") echo(string.rep([[|]], width)) fg("a_darkgreen") echo(string.rep("-", 30 - width))
fg("a_darkgrey") echo(" " .. percent .. "% power") deselect() resetFormat()
local diff = 5000 - tonumber(multimatches[2][2]) svo.af = math.floor(diff/(svo.stats.maxhealth * .05)) svo.aff = math.floor(diff/(svo.stats.maxmana * .05))
echo"\n" svo.echof("fortify: %d, power: %d", svo.af, svo.aff)
if svo.fixangel == "fortify" then for i = 1, svo.af do svo.doadd("angel fortify", false, false) end if svo.af == 0 then svo.echof("Your angel is healthy already.") end svo.fixangel = nil elseif svo.fixangel == "power" then for i = 1, svo.aff do svo.doadd("angel power", false, false) end if svo.aff == 0 then svo.echof("Your angel is healthy already.") end svo.fixangel = nil end

^Angel\d+ +\w+ +(\d+)$

Your insomnia has cleared up.
You now possess the gift of the third eye.
You already possess the third eye.
Your mind is already touched by the Deathgod.
You shut your eyes and concentrate on Thoth, the God of Death. A moment later, you feel inextricably linked with Death itself.
Pain wracks your soul as you begin your new life. As the new body forms, you realise you now have
^Pain wracks your soul as you begin your new life\. As the new body forms, you realise you now have .+? and .+?, and you are covered with .+\.$

Standing amid the blackened plantlife, you cup your hands around a cube of elemental ice, focusing as it warms at your touch and rapidly begins to melt. Ethereal wisps of steam waft from the ice, numbing your fingers with cold.

Whispering a private prayer to the earth, you let the newly melted waters drip upon the ground. Lush green growth sparks into life around every rejuvenating drop, rapidly spreading as Nature's vibrance is restored.
Your concentration is disturbed and your lose your focus on restoring the surrounding environment.

As you feel the last remnants of strength ebb from your tormented body, you close your eyes and let darkness embrace you. Suddenly, you feel your consciousness wrenched from its pitiful mortal frame and your soul is free. You feel your form shifting, warping and changing as you whirl and spiral outward, ever outward. A jolt of sensation awakens you, and you open your eyes tentatively to find yourself trapped within a physical body once more.
return isPrompt()
Your city is not focusing upon an astronomical body.
The power of the bloodsworn leaves you.

Trigger.name: svo medidate done
Trigger.script:
if svo.conf.medprone then if svo.ignore.prone and (not svo.conf.aillusion or stats.currentmana == stats.maxmana) then svo.ignore.prone = nil echo'\n' svo.echof("Took prone off ignore, since you're done meditating.") end end
if svo.conf.unmed then svo.defs.keepup("meditate", false) end

regexCodeList.string: You cease your meditation having achieved full will and mana.
You must dismount before you can mount anything else.
You cannot do that while mounted.
You must dismount from what you are currently riding before you can mount anything else.
A'dene, Priestess of the Holy Three utters a prayer and smites your arm.
It breaks with a loud 'CRACK'.
Ulgase, the lich crone conjures a large flame within her bony palm. Shaping it into a fiery fireball, she sends it flying into the room, scorching your flesh and setting you on fire.
Toogar, the ursu shaman reaches into his small satchel and produces a vial of bubbling liquid which he throws at you, the vial shattering and covering you with burning liquid.
Eyes searching wildly, an ogre cook spies his recipe book on the floor. Scooping it up in one filthy hand, he sets it aflame and tosses it directly at your face.
Reaching into a burlap sack, an orc cook retrieves a fistful of decomposing kitten corpses. Quickly lighting them on fire with the cooking spit, he grunts and throws them at you.
Enuru, the Bane of Karbaz raises his hands into the air and invokes a blast of fire that lands upon your chest, sending you down to the floor.
Tiamenjiara, the court conjuror rubs her hands briskly together, spreading them to reveal a growing ball of flame. With a forceful gesture she hurls the fire toward you, scorching your flesh.
A colossal water strider suddenly turns his backside towards you and sprays an acidic liquid across your torso.

Holding her golden candelabra in front of her, Ilucara Pelendur, Advisor to the Shah suddenly spits out a foul, noxious liquid into the flames with great force. As the fire comes into contact with the now-airborne fluid, a raging lash of flame begins to consume your skin, setting you aflame.
A bloodied acolyte gives a maniacal cackle and summons a wave of fiery magic, blasting it at you and setting you on fire!
A sect ritualist gives a maniacal cackle and summons a wave of fiery magic, blasting it at you and setting you on fire!

Yurasta Tarcalion, the Thaumaturge reaches into his robes and grabs a random vial. He throws the vessel to the ground in front of you, and you watch in stunned surprise as it explodes with a green fire.
Caurnn, the blacksmith howls as he brings his red-hot hammer crashing down on your head, singeing your skin.
A Qurnok woman hurls the orb at you and it explodes upon contact.
Twirling his staff above his head, Zen'fi Haar'chen sends a spinning pillar of fire across the chamber, burning everything in its path.

Muttering a few arcane phrases under her breath, Sindrastar Nerrinth, the High Counsellor rapidly generates a ball of searing fire between the palms of her hands. Moments later, she sends it hurtling through the air towards you, bursting on impact and engulfing you in flames.
She opens her small mouth and lets loose a lash of fire to scorch your flesh.
He opens his small mouth and lets loose a lash of fire to scorch your flesh.
Waving his staff erratically, Zen'fi Haar'chen conjures a swirling fireball at you.
Pulling the cap off her flask, Captain Kelley, Mayor of Mysia douses you in alcohol with one hand before flicking her cigar onto you with the other.
Nhamdi, the elder closes his eyes and begins to chant rhythmically beneath his breath as drowsiness pricks at your mind, and you drift into sleep.
A crimson pyrapede scuttles rapidly about your feet, setting your clothing on fire.
Chanting a quick, forceful incantation, Balam Agab, the ogre archmage summons a ring of raging fire around you. The flames painfully sear your skin as you inhale the thick, black smoke.
A pillar of living fire's fiery gaze lingers on you, and your skin and hair smoulder and then ignite.

With a great sweep of his mighty staff, Maal'ryn Asgarai, Outrider Ascendant summons a great geyser of brightly burning liquid fire behind him that arcs upwards into the air and rains down furiously upon you.
Anger blossoms in Faylinn, Lady of Unsidhe Court's eyes as she summons forth a barrage of fiery motes to torment you.
While the tip is still hot, he quickly jabs you with the spear.
A flame leaps upward from the surface of the molten lava as it flows over your foot, scalding you with its searing heat.
Hethern Silwenil, Revered Counsellor's hands glow with a soft red light, before discharging two sheets of scorching flame that engulf you mercilessly.
You suddenly feel your skin begin to burn and eventually ignite.
Pointing his fingers in your direction, Begath, the Migri mage sends a massive fireball directly into your body.
A House Feranki mage pulls out a small box the size of a human fist, shakes it, and throws it at you. On contact it explodes, burning you horribly.
The light strikes you in the chest, suffusing your body in flames.
Oberion, King of the Fairies pinches a handful of iridescent powder from his satchel and blows it at you, causing your senses to whirl from a kaleidoscope of colour.
Turga, the ursu midwife takes a syringe out of her satchel and stabs you with it, the contents rushing into your system and making you feel woozy and slow.

A vicious swarm of acacidic ants climb upon each other, forming a thin tower before you. Suddenly, the ant at the top of the column begins to stare intensely into your eyes, leaving your world moving slower than usual.
As the liquid enters your system, everything suddenly becomes so much slower.
Screw-eye, the inmate superior sneers wickedly as he stabs into one of your veins with a foul needle. All movement slows as your body begins to swagger and sway sluggishly.
A xorani priestess utters something under her breath. Slowly she raises her hand into the air, then makes a wide sweep across the room.
Kamille, the Theran healer lifts her hands in a dramatic arc, bringing them together with a tremendous burst of bright light that slams into your chest.
Chanting rhythmically under his breath, Derillin Yu'tar unleashes a blast of energy throughout the area.
A weretigress mutters some arcane words sweeping her hands through the air, a bright flash emanates from her finger tips striking you solidly in the chest.
A mad cackle from a cloaked assassin precedes the flicking of two Aeon tarots at you in quick succession, followed closely by a throwing dagger sinking into your chest.
Ayod'nai, Whisperer of the All utters a string of words, and the world around you seems to slow down.
Chanting a quick, forceful incantation, Balam Agab, the ogre archmage summons a ring of raging fire around you. The flames painfully sear your skin as you inhale the thick, black smoke.
In a lightning quick motion, a humble monk grabs your throat and begins to crush your windpipe, leaving you gasping for air.
In a lightning quick motion, a young monk grabs your throat and begins to crush your windpipe, leaving you gasping for air.
A mad cackle from a cloaked assassin precedes the flicking of two Aeon tarots at you in quick succession, followed closely by a throwing dagger sinking into your chest.
A transparent cahno stares intensely into your eyes, leaving you unsure as to who or where you are.

An unnatural grating noise enters the air as a rush of freezing wind erupts outward from an ice golem, chilling you to the bone.
A tundra mercenary whips a swirl of cold snow into your face before sweeping your legs.
Engorged and thoroughly fed, a rock leech wraps its massive girth about you, squeezing until your joints creak.
Utterly heedless, the Leviathan catches you in the midst of its writhing and thrashing, crushing you with no visible effort.
A goblin smith swings a hard throw to your limbs, and you feel numb.
A single massive hand grasps you and flings you away as a colossal, hulking ghoul turns and stomps after you for the kill.
A goblin slave swings a hard throw to your limbs, and you feel numb.
Slicing his broadsword through the air, Knight Commander Lord Ethran Rani smashes it against one of your limbs, the force tearing through muscle and shattering bone.
Slicing his broadsword through the air, Commander Malrian Kyra smashes it against one of your limbs, the force tearing through muscle and shattering bone.
Slicing his broadsword through the air, Commander Farista Errikale smashes it against one of your limbs, the force tearing through muscle and shattering bone.
With eyes closed, Malvoc, the unholy chants dark prayers as he gestures through the air, and with a sudden motion he flings his eyes open.
You feel your bones snapping and crunching within your body.
With three powerful strikes to your ribs, shoulder and sternum with his mace, an ogre captain knocks you to the floor, leaving you broken, bloody and bruised.
Knocking your legs out from under you with his mace, an ogre captain moves in and stomps down on your body with all his weight.
With a scream of sheer wrath, Mrughor, a spectral warlock lets loose a flying kick, striking you hard as the sound of breaking bone resounds.
With surprising strength, Turga, the ursu midwife grabs you with powerful arms and squeezes, splintering bones.

Xulu, an orc witchdoctor whispers quietly to the air. The words begin to echo in your ears, growing louder until they reach a painful climax. As they subside, feelings of peace and confusion washes over your body.
An orb of shimmering light emits a blinding flash of light and an explosive thunderclap that leaves you disoriented and confused.
The staff in Jerak, Captain of the Guard's hands becomes a blur as he slams it into your head three times in rapid succession, then finishes with a vicious thrust to your chest.

A shriek of rage emits from Karinda Talkar, and the waters around you begin swirling. After a short moment, you are dragged into and whirlpool and whipped about in multiple circles, leaving you light-headed and dizzy.
An orb of shimmering light emits a blinding flash of light and an explosive thunderclap that leaves you disoriented and confused.
As Tybatha, the Oracle of Saiha'balan bows her head slightly toward you, your mind is battered by a strange telepathic force. The room blurs into a spinning mess.
Calling upon her intimate link with the forests, Erato, spirit of the Eastern Ithmia summons a whirlwind of leaves to swirl about you, leaving your head spinning.
Swinging his longsword at your head, a proud knight errant deals you a glancing blow across the temple.
Swinging his longsword at your head, a sturdy knight deals you a glancing blow across the temple.
A young monk balls up her small fist and pummels it into your stomach, causing you to feel nauseated while dizziness begins to overwhelm you.
A young monk balls up his small fist and pummels it into your stomach, causing you to feel nauseated while dizziness begins to overwhelm you.
Swinging suddenly with a spiteful backhand, Brendel, the fishmonger smacks you hard, sending your head ringing with dizziness.
With a thunderous roar, a knight of the Siroccian Order slams his gauntleted fist hard into your face.
All of a sudden, the past becomes little more than a fuzzy haze.

A shriek of rage emits from Karinda Talkar, and the waters around you begin swirling. After a short moment, you are dragged into and whirlpool and whipped about in multiple circles, leaving you light-headed and dizzy.
A burly troll guard hums a gutteral chant under his breath and shoves you to the ground in a dizzy heap.
A lesser Penumbran fiend glances at you with a penetrating stare, its eyes burning with a madness that sets your mind aflame with insanity.
Circling like a predator, Eschtar, the Swift steps in and slices you across both shoulders and you lose all feeling and control of your arms.
Moving with astounding speed, a gargantuan ishkynd worm slings his body around your legs and squeezes them as hard as he can. You hear your bones snap as the pressure becomes higher and higher.
Flemming, the Ka'ah Botanist leaps at you and wrestles you to the ground, twisting your legs into an unnatural position as you hear the sound of snapping bones.
Leaning even more heavily on her staff, Pirin, an elderly woman kicks you in the shins with all the strength she can muster.

TriggerGroup.name: Drazik's svo bashing triggers
TriggerGroup.script: ---THESE TRIGGERS ARE FREE TO ANYONE USING A PAID COPY OF SVO--- ---TRIGGERS CODED, ORGANIZED, AND MAINTAINED BY DRAZIK--- ---SPECIAL THANKS TO LYNARA, NIEELENSARS, RIPLEY, JARL, AND--- ---EVERYONE ELSE WHO HAS HELPED COLLECT AND TEST THESE TRIGGERS---

regexCodeList.string: Powering his tail, a duskfin tuna speeds towards your head, his body connecting with a force that leaves your ears ringing.
A herd of hippocampi stretch out their long necks, opening their mouths to send out a collective sonic wave that shatters the eardrums and stuns the other senses.
Rocketing through the water, a duskfin tuna rams into your arm, splintering the bone with agonising force.
A hideaway nautilus speeds through the water towards you, shell forward, its pointed tip narrowly missing you as you are caught in the whirling strands of kelp following its speeding form.
Adopting an aggressive demeanor, a herd of hippocampi charges you in a great headlong rush, bowling you over and sending you somersaulting helplessly through the sea currents.
A hulking geryas slams her body into you, sending you flailing helplessly through the water several feet.
Rolling into a tight ball in mid-stream, a malevolent sea dragon barrels into you, lacerating your skin with the multiple, razor-sharp spines jutting out from his back and tail.
Generating great speed as it moves through the water, a millstone fish launches itself at you, ramming into you with bone-breaking force.
A wyrm whelp pivots suddenly, whipping his long, sinuous tail around and slamming it into the back of your knees to knock you flat onto your back.

The jaws of an ancient wyrm unhinge, revealing scythe-like crescent fangs. Rather than darting forward as one might have expected, an ancient wyrm emits a shrill, high-pitched keening that assaults your senses, causing you to drop to your knees in pain.

A ferocious gleam lights the Wyrm Lord's eyes as he wheels to stare directly at you. An instant later, the Wyrm Lord charges straight at you, flames rippling around his form. He smashes brutally into you, knocking you to the ground.

The Wyrm Lord bellows a terrible, ground-shaking roar, stamping his clawed feet upon the rocks vigorously. From his maw erupts a slender crimson stream that covers you in burning lava, setting you aflame!
A fire wyrm rears his head back and exhales as fire races from his mouth to engulf you.
Pitching his bloated, serpentine body headlong towards your leg, a wyrm whelp clamps down upon the appendage and grinds his sharply serrated teeth into your flesh.
A crimson pyrapede scurries around your feet, intertwining its body around them tightly and sweeping you off your feet.

regexCodeList.string: A xorani guardian quickly envenoms the tip of his spear and stabs you with a quick flick of his scaley wrist.
Locking its tail stiffly behind its back, an imposing cockatrice turns to the side and rapidly stabs you with its feathers.
A dark, lithe puma pounces onto you and bites down on your neck, its poisonous saliva dripping into your blood.
Casting a shifty glance at you, a mischievous grin creeps across Prui's face as he runs up to you and bites you in the side.
Taking his blood-stained spear, a xorani guardian sweeps your legs out from under you and sends you tumbling to the ground. In the same swift motion, he stabs his spear into your stomach.
Chak takes up a large piece of wood and smacks you upside the head with it, making you reel and fall to the ground.
An imposing cockatrice opens its maw and lets out a loud, deafening squawk that causes the surroundings to tremble, knocking all around it to the ground.
A dark, baleful spectre suddenly explodes into a widespread mist. A ghastly wail echoes from within it as it re-forms, plunging you into a panic.
A dark shroud lets out a high-pitched laugh as its dark form suddenly expands and covers the surroundings in a black mist.
A dark, lithe puma takes a running start and pounces on you, knocking you to the ground and tearing at you with its claws.

A xorani hunter takes a huge net and throws it towards you.
You watch as the net unfurls itself and traps you within its bindings.

A xorani priestess removes a tarot card from a deck hidden within her garments. Rubbing the card quickly, she activates its hidden energies and flings the card in your direction. The card explodes in a violent flash, stunning you momentarily. When you regain control you realise you are entangled in a mass of invisible rope.

The charcoal eye upon the chest plate of a xorani temple guard begins to glow bright orange. The guard turns toward you and lets out a resounding warcry. The flaming eye rushes toward you, knocking you back and setting you ablaze.

A xorani temple guard slashes across your torso with his voulge, causing searing pain to ripple through your body to the point of fainting. As you regain consciousness, you remember you are mid-combat, yet your body is unresponsive.
Rearing back his head, Commander Xu unleashes a fiery blast, sweeping back and forth to engulf all in a blazing inferno.
The current from the pulling of the waves suddenly catches your footing and knocks you off your feet.
With all (?:his|her) wooden strength, a stick(?:man|woman) picks you up as though you were a rag doll and smashes you into the ground.
^Thorny vines whip out from a stick(?:man|woman) and wrap around you, pricking and binding you\.$
Your muscles stiffen and lock as a ghast brushes you with a finger.
A cursed phantasm reaches out with his ghostly hand and brushes it across your chest, your limbs locking up immediately.
With a ferocious hiss, a pale vampiress sends a fine mist of blood swirling at you and suddenly, your limbs become stiff and unresponsive.
With a ferocious hiss, a vampire sends a fine mist of blood swirling at you and suddenly, your limbs become stiff and unresponsive.
Panic fills your mind as Zsarachnor, the Vampire Lord looms over you, deadly intent upon his grim visage.
With a ferocious hiss, Zsarachnor, the Vampire Lord sends a fine mist of blood swirling at you and suddenly, your limbs become stiff and unresponsive.
A medium pulsating spider sprays you with a sticky webbing, which quickly entangles your limbs.
A small pulsating spider sprays you with a sticky webbing, which quickly entangles your limbs.
A huge pulsating spider sprays you with a sticky webbing, which quickly entangles your limbs.
A guardian spider sprays you with a sticky webbing, which quickly entangles your limbs.
Lachesis, the Spider Queen shoots out a mass of sticky webbing at you.
A choke creeper lashes out with a vine and wraps it tightly around you.
Candlemas, last of the Lorewardens shimmers, then blows a chill breath at you, covering you with a graveyard frost.
A massive outstretched arm comes crashing towards you as a shambling zombie slams it into you, snapping your bones with a crunching sound.
A decaying zombie smashes his rotting fist into your arm and you hear bones crunch.
A decaying lich grips tightly around an ebony staff and swings it towards your legs, knocking your feet off the ground.
A shambling zombie leaps towards you and latches himself unto you, sending you tumbling to the ground and your head slamming into the floor.
A decaying lich reaches out to touch you with a bony finger, a wicked gleam in his eyes.
A revolting ghoul draws his massive hands together in a thunderclap with you at its centre.
A goblin zombie kicks his rotting foot into your leg and you hear bones crunch.

With an expert combat manoeuvre, a Tsol'dasi guardian dodges around you, leaving your back exposed. She strikes with surgical precision, her frozen blade almost severing your spine and sending you sprawling to the floor.

With an expert combat manoeuvre, a Tsol'dasi guardian dodges around you, leaving your back exposed. He strikes with surgical precision, his frozen blade almost severing your spine and sending you sprawling to the floor.

With an expert combat manoeuvre, a Tsol'dasi guardian dodges around you, leaving your back exposed. She strikes with surgical precision, her frozen blade almost severing your spine and sending you sprawling to the floor.
A Tsol'dasi mystic takes a deep breath and blows a frigid puff of air into your face, searing your lungs painfully as you inhale.
An eerie light shines within a Tsol'dasi mystic's eyes as he places his hands on your head, willing the polar cold into every fibre of your being.
An eerie light shines within a Tsol'dasi mystic's eyes as she places her hands on your head, willing the polar cold into every fibre of your being.
Shouting a battle cry in archaic Tsol, a Tsol'dasi guardian launches herself at you with sword drawn. Polar flame wreathes her sword as she sunders your limbs with merciless efficiency.
Shouting a battle cry in archaic Tsol, a Tsol'dasi guardian launches himself at you with sword drawn. Polar flame wreathes his sword as he sunders your limbs with merciless efficiency.
Wreathing his hand in pale blue energy, a Tsol'dasi mystic hurls a crackling wave of glacial power at you, slamming you against the wall and leaving you dazed.
Wreathing her hand in pale blue energy, a Tsol'dasi mystic hurls a crackling wave of glacial power at you, slamming you against the wall and leaving you dazed.

Rising to her full height, Pryla'ari, Priestess of Life invokes the terrible power of the ritual circle inscribed overhead. Arcane might pulses violently for a moment before pouring into your body, wracking it with horrible, jarring pain.

Pryla'ari, Priestess of Life throws her head back and incants a dreadful malediction. Overhead, the ritual circle flares with power and the world around you begins to slow before consciousness leaves you entirely.

Pryla'ari, Priestess of Life throws her head back and incants a dreadful malediction. Overhead, the ritual circle flares with power and the world around you begins to slow before consciousness leaves you entirely.

Delicate strands of energy trail behind Pryla'ari, Priestess of Life's hands as she passes them through the air. The ribbons of energy coalesce into glittering serpents whose gleaming fangs pierce deep into your body, pumping wave after wave of polar ice into your veins.
Raising his swords high, Rylan Asgarai brings them crashing down on your arm, nearly severing the limb entirely.

Drawing himself up to his full height, Rylan Asgarai crosses his blades before himself and begins to incant. With a flash of power, the swords are transformed into a massive spear of ice that flies of its own volition and buries itself in your innards.
You cry out in horror as your very marrow freezes and snaps beneath the weight of the Tsol'dasi's magic.
Frigid light coalesces into rapier-thin lances that streak through the air to pierce your head, heart, and stomach, spreading a terrible chill through your broken body.
Raising his hands heavily, Lamqar, the Doyen calls down a blizzard to fill the chamber with winter's wrath.
Swimming at you with alarming speed, a multi-headed water hydra slams his huge body into you full-force, sending you sprawling.
The shadowy form of a blue-spotted stingray passes quickly overhead when suddenly, he veers and knocks you right off your feet.
Rearing up on his massive hind legs, a multi-headed water hydra gives a deafening bellow before crashing down to pin you beneath his tremendous weight.
Swarming you in a flurry of orange colour, a school of clownfish swims dizzingly around you until you are transfixed by the motion.
A hideous, writhing squid emits a cloud of deadly black ink, its toxins seeping into your sensory systems until you black out completely.
With terrifying speed, a large bull shark races forward and smashes his head into your stomach, sending you reeling.
A brilliantly coloured sea anemone's translucent tentacles brush past you and suddenly, you are unable to move.
A translucent jellyfish floats lazily by, brushing gently by you with his stinging tentacles.
The ice shards whirling around a sakuwat ice warrior's form quickly meld, forming a sharpened spear. Grabbing the spear out of mid-air, he impales your body, freezing you before the spear melts away.
An icy blue luminescence shoots out from a sakuwat ice warrior's extended arm and envelops you, leaving your body extremely cold.
With a swift motion of her arm, a female sakuwat sends a gust of freezing wind across your body, sending a chill down your back.
Solkuwan, an apprentice sakuwat hunter brings his massive arm back and thrusts it forward rapidly, punching you square in the face and sending you rolling backwards.
Corpse in hand, Merkuwan, the skinner swings his arms around menacingly, slams it into you and knocks you to the ground.
A sakuwat youngling lets out a piercing scream and the unstable stalactites above fall toward the ground and shatter upon hitting your body, sending you crumbling to the floor.
Swinging the corpse of a dead fish, Derin, the sakuwat fisher smashes you on theside of the head, sending you sprawling to the ground.
Ankuwan, the Watcher brings his arm back and quickly thrusts it toward your chest, sending you flying backwards.
A giant pink salmon whips its tail and smacks you across the face, sending you backwards.
A massive swordfish whips its tail and smacks you across the face, sending you backwards.

Molkuwan, the egg protector grabs both of your arms within his grasp and coats them in thick ice, sending chills down your back. Tightening his grasp, Molkuwan, the egg protector shatters your ice-coated arms.
As you walk onto the slick ice, you slip and fall on your back.
Molkuwan, the egg protector concentrates briefly, coating his fists in ice. Raising his head, he punches you square in the face, causing you to roll backwards.
Narntoth, the Elder Mage raises his ice staff and it shatters in his hand. The icicles hover momentarily, then quickly surround and cut you before instantly reforming in his grasp.
Taking a deep breath, Ankuwan, the Watcher summons a frigid wind that surrounds you, slowly freezing your body.
on fire
Brandishing his fists boldly, a studious Tsol'dasi man swings viciously at your arm, breaking the bone with a sickening 'CRACK'.
Brandishing his fists boldly, a joyful Tsol'dasi villager swings viciously at your arm, breaking the bone with a sickening 'CRACK'.
Brandishing his fists boldly, a Tsol'dasi villager swings viciously at your arm, breaking the bone with a sickening 'CRACK'.
Manipulating and compressing the air around her, a priestess of Life sends it whistling towards you. The gust of wind makes contact with your arm, nearly tearing it completely from the joint.
With an aggravated growl, Shantuir, Watch Ascendant swings his staff violently at your arm which shatters upon contact with a sickening crunch.
Brandishing his fists boldly, a grey-haired Tsol'dasi swings viciously at your arm, breaking the bone with a sickening 'CRACK'.

A whisper spider outrider moves close to you with speed, grabbing an arm while slamming into your body. The force of the impact causes you to somersault onto the ground, dislocating your arm in the process.
Pointing the spherical tip of the staff towards you, a watch spider outrider smiles before tapping it gently. A torrent of fire erupts from its surface, setting you aflame with its incandescence.
With a quick, arcane utterance beneath his breath, an intense flame billows from atop his staff towards you.

Grasping his blade of fire in both hands, an haruspex of Life brings it up over his head to bear upon you, the force of the blade's fiery impact causing it to disperse into thousands of motes of light.
Grasping the blade of fire by the hilt, an haruspex of Life slashes into you.
Celepharn, High Priest of Life calls forth a seething black ray shot through with veins of coruscating green fire, sending it flying towards you.
Glowing missiles with fiery, flaming tails hurtle through the firmament towards you, exploding on impact in a shower of heat and sparks.
Slowly generating them between his hands, Santhrar, a young prince summons five fist-sized globes of blue fire and sends them hurtling towards you.
A mighty flame-wreathed phoenix materialises before Sariontari, Queen of Istarion, giving a clear, ringing call.
A watch spider outrider sends the sphere end of her staff into one of your kneecaps, causing your bones to crack and pop unpleasantly.
Seizing your leg within a grasp of blade-like limbs, a watch spiderling draws forth a pool of blood as it rakes through tendons.
Roaring defiance, a Tsol'dasi boy charges into you with a shoulder tackle.
With a single, smooth motion, a priestess of Life extends both arms in your direction as a wave of sheer, invisible force impacts your solar plexus, sending you flying.

Arafaile, priestess of Life draws back and extends both arms as if to push you, never making contact. A moment later, you are thrown off your feet by a blast of nearly invisible, heat-like energy emerging from her fists.
Tossing his head back and chanting an incantation to the heavens, an acolyte of Life summons down a pillar of holy fire from above, striking you to your knees.
Moving quickly, a Tsol'dasi merchant plants one foot solidly in the side of your kneecap, causing your legs to buckle underneath you.
Its eight red eyes gleaming, a sword spiderling utters a high-pitched shriek and skitters towards you, knocking you to the ground before retreating.
A watch spiderling dances forward and hurls itself bodily at your chest.
An ear-splitting shriek is emitted by a sword spider as it rushes towards you with furious speed, pinning you with the end of one hooked leg while using three others to stab into you repeatedly.
A watch spider hurtles towards you with its eight legs fully outstretched, wrapping them tightly around your body and forcing you to tumble to the ground.
With ocelei vibrating agitatedly, Saldesari Elisanil, Warren Ascendant's whisper spider lurches forward and brings its front legs crashing onto your shoulders, sending you to the ground.
Hissing out a single word, Rheddrian Zorinar, Revered Counsellor conjures a mighty geyser of water that blasts you clean off your feet and sends you sprawling.
A watch spider drops its entire body close to the ground and begins to spin in a clockwise direction, suddenly extending a single spindly leg to knock you off your feet.
An opaque beam of blinding white light descends from the heavens, blasting you clear off your feet.
Moving quickly, a Tsol'dasi merchant plants one foot solidly in the side of your kneecap, causing your legs to buckle underneath you.
Sindrastar Nerrinth, the High Counsellor drops to the floor and sweeps her legs around at you, sending you sprawling.

A whisper spider outrider moves close to you with speed, grabbing an arm while slamming into your body. The force of the impact causes you to somersault onto the ground, dislocating your arm in the process.
Staring at you with icy blue eyes, an astrologer chants a brief incantation as you feel a sickly chill overcome your entire body.
In a sing-song voice, a priestess of Life completes an elaborate Tsol'dasi chant as ancient, gnarled roots emerge from the earth around your feet, ensnaring you on the spot.
With a negligent wave of her hand, Rheddrian Zorinar, Revered Counsellor invokes a glittering mithril net into existence and sends it flying towards you.
A whisper spider rears up on its back legs, delivering a fine stream of sticky silk that swiftly binds your limbs into motionlessness.
The spinnerets of Saldesari Elisanil, Warren Ascendant's whisper spider twitch curiously before sending a thick strand of webbing at you.

Tsui'zhir, Whisper Ascendant releases a series of three staccato whistles and his mount fires a burst of silk in your direction. As the sticky substance entangles you, you scream out in pain as you feel the threads begin to eat away at your skin.
Khurthia, Sword Ascendant offers a sharp cry, to which her spider mount thunders forward, slamming its forehead into your chest forcefully as it tramples over you.
Saldesari Elisanil, Warren Ascendant cries a quick command to her whisper spider. The beast darts forward quickly in response, fangs gleaming as they sink into your flesh.
Avathar'an, the King of Istarion gives a mighty shout, fiery eyes turning furiously towards you as he hurtles one after another fireball slamming into your chest.
A whisper spider descends upon you with its massive fur-covered body, stabbing you deeply in the chest with a pair of wicked fangs.
Eyes flashing with wrath, Vargalast Megurun, Revered Counsellor snaps his fingers sharply and you immediately find yourself unable to move any of your joints.
Slowly and surely, Celepharn, High Priest of Life conjures the presence of three misty rings around your form, holding you in perfect stillness and preventing even your ability to breathe.
Celepharn, High Priest of Life's face momentarily bloats and rots.
His putrid visage wreaks of rotting flesh, and the sound of maggots squirming out of the various orifices of his skull can be discerned.
Slowly and surely, Celepharn, High Priest of Life conjures the presence of three misty rings around your form, holding you in perfect stillness and preventing even your ability to breathe.

Grasping his blade of fire in both hands, an haruspex of Life brings it up over his head to bear upon you, the force of the blade's fiery impact causing it to disperse into thousands of motes of light.
Glowing missiles with fiery, flaming tails hurtle through the firmament towards you, exploding on impact in a shower of heat and sparks.
Hissing out a single word, Rheddrian Zorinar, Revered Counsellor conjures a mighty geyser of water that blasts you clean off your feet and sends you sprawling.
A shroud of crimson electricity descends upon you, shocking your body relentlessly.
A mighty flame-wreathed phoenix materialises before Sariontari, Queen of Istarion, giving a clear, ringing call.
You are suddenly arrested by the breathtaking vision of two unicorns moving soundlessly through the still, quiet jungle before you.
A pinprick of light materialises between Arafaile, priestess of Life's hands, rapidly growing into a blindingly bright ball that disappears with a sudden flash, rendering you unable to see.

Grasping his blade of fire in both hands, an haruspex of Life brings it up over his head to bear upon you, the force of the blade's fiery impact causing it to disperse into thousands of motes of light.
An ear-splitting shriek is emitted by a sword spider as it rushes towards you with furious speed, pinning you with the end of one hooked leg while using three others to stab into you repeatedly.
A pinprick of light materialises between Arafaile, priestess of Life's hands, rapidly growing into a blindingly bright ball that disappears with a sudden flash, rendering you unable to see.
Music lilts with a magical quality in the air around an acolyte of Life as he smiles, invitingly, at you, mesmerising you with his wild, ancient beauty.

Eriador, the Tsol'dasi merchant master pulls out a small silver dagger, previously concealed beneath his flowing garb, and plunges it into your stomach. As the blade is removed, blood begins to leak from the wound and you start to feel sick.
A monstrous gamling spider impales you with one of his many hooked legs, shaking you viciously before flinging you to the ground.
Propelled by his giant back legs, a giant gwaeron springs towards you with head lowered, butting into your chest and sending you sprawling.
A bearded pig gores you through the leg with one of his mighty tusks, sending you to your knees with a cry of anguish.
Head lowered, a bearded pig charges at you from a distance, slamming his head into your gut and sending you sprawling.
An agile kamatlan leaps through the air towards you, knocking you to the ground before swiping viciously at your exposed chest.
Balancing on several sets of hind legs, a morpho caterpillar raises itself into the air and brings its head crashing down onto you painfully.
A monstrous gamling spider sticks you with the end of one sharply hooked leg, pinning you to the ground mercilessly.
A monstrous gamling spider sticks you with the end of one sharply hooked leg, pinning you to the ground mercilessly.
An agile kamatlan sinks his massive fangs into your leg, holding you still while the snakes extending from his shoulders attack from either side, biting you rapidly and repeatedly.
You recoil with a sudden jerk as a blue-crowned ifrit careens into you, his contact with your skin sending a deep numbness deep into your musculature.
With a quick jerk of his tiny head, a blue-crowned ifrit jabs his thin, wickedly sharp beak deep into your flesh as a hot, tingling sensation begins to spread through your bloodstream.

The air around an armoured boalisk shimmers momentarily as he springs through the air towards you, fangs fully extended, and sinks them deep into your flesh as a slow-burning venom begins to travel through your bloodstream.
A flying viper's eyes glow and change colour as it weaves through the air in an intricate pattern, transfixing you unawares.
Accompanied by its haunting song, a brightly feathered olbi dances exotically before you, captivating you with its brilliant display of colour.
With a triumphant roar, a crystalline ice demon lifts you up and throws you to the ground with bone-breaking force.
With a triumphant roar, Kolyartus, the Blizzard lifts you up and throws you to the ground with bone-breaking force.
Your skin becomes clammy and blue as a crystalline ice demon touches you with an icy claw, chilling you to the core.
Kolyartus, the Blizzard exhales a blast of ice cold mist over you, and your body becomes frigid and still.
Roaring in defiance, a Hriddan warrior knocks you down, trampling you with a rain of hoof blows.
A female minotaur lowers her head and rams straight into you, knocking you flat on your back.
Rak Gorlan, the hunter throws an uppercut punch and connects firmly with your jaw, knocking you down.
A Hriddan warrior rains down a series of blows onto your arm as pain lances up your shoulder and the bones shatter under the assault.
Grabbing you in a bear hug, Rak Gorlan, the hunter crushes you as the sickening crunch of snapping bones becomes suddenly audible.
Osta Murtai swings a cast iron pot into your temple, causing your ears to ring from the force of the blow.
Grutan Sustrae chants in a soporific voice and you slump into unconsciousness, unable to stay awake.
Grut Vlugar, the Bone Dancer whispers a curse under his breath, and your limbs suddenly lock up.

Your body stiffens rapidly with paralysis.
As it lunges at you with a clumsy swipe, a shambling mummy's blackened nails send feelings of sluggishness and lethargy through your body.
Seizing your leg with her decaying jaw, a baleful hyena jerks her head back and forth, agonisingly ripping away flesh.
Her burning eyes locking with your own, a baleful hyena lets loose a direful howl that fills your mind with dread.
Springing from the ground, a baleful hyena collides heavily with your chest and knocks you sprawling.
A huge crystalline spider smashes into your legs, the sound of shattering bone audible as you are tossed bodily to the ground.
A huge crystalline spider hurls itself through the air at you, pinning you beneath its heavy body and piercing your flesh in multiple locations.
Catching you momentarily off-balance, A colossal rockbeast charges into you, trampling you easily beneath its massive feet.
Moving at near lightning speed, a bare-chested pirate slams his head into yours, making you slightly dizzy.
A bare-chested pirate knocks your legs out from under you and sends you sprawling to the floor.

Trigger.name: annoying room aeon at green lake cave

regexCodeList.string: Eerie blue light bathes the cave, and your movements slow.
Lowering his head, a hulking hobgoblin charges toward you and knocks you back with his shoulder.
A giant scorpion viciously drives its tail into your skin several times in rapid succession.
You are confused as to the effects of the venom.
A giant scorpion skitters forward and barrels into your kneecaps, sending you to the ground.
A giant scorpion reaches out with its claw and clamps it around your leg, snapping it in two.
Turning its back to you, a banana spider spews strong webbing from its rear end to entangle you.
Katox, the Village Captain drops to his hands and knees. A massive scorpion's tail rises from behind him and strikes your torso several times in rapid succession.
With an agitated sneer, Shanugis reaches for a nearby weapon and flings it carelessly at you.
Galeria, the housewife batters you over the head with a large frying pan, knocking you senseless.
Andir slings a coil of rope from his shoulder and skilfully flings it at your legs, knocking you over and entangling your legs in the knots.
A spearhead shark opens its deadly mouth and clamps onto your leg, breaking the bone and gushing blood into the surrounding water.
After prowling in a wide circle about you, a silver panther gives a startling yowl and pounces, knocking you flat on your back.
Dark green fletching buzzes as a Dyissan warrior fires a pair of arrows, their ooze-laden heads thudding into your chest.
Swiftly drawing his dirk, Sanass, the Chosen slides around behind you and plunges the blade deeply into your side, causing a strange burning sensation to shoot through your body.
A mass of sticky tendrils streak out from a marsh ooze, wrapping you in a cocoon of slime.

Death Knight Lord Kemnast becomes a blur of motion, feinting and whirling and dodging at inhuman speeds, slashing at you repeatedly from multiple angles in a display of consummate swordsmanship that knocks you flat.
The Ur'Vampire Prioska bows her head, slumping forward as if in deep thought. You feel drawn, thinned, and the world around you speeds up noticeably.
A pale-skinned, humanoid vampire crosses her arms and makes a throwing gesture with her hands towards your body, holding you in place with an invisible influence.
A shiver of panic runs down your spine as the horror of a rotting zombie's existence strikes you.
A horrible wail from a luminescent ghost surrounds you, sucking at your will to live.
A decaying zombie kicks his rotting foot into your leg and you hear bones crunch.
Aiming his swing towards your upper body, a mhun knight shatters your arm with a skilled shot.
Aiming his swing towards your upper body, a mhun knight shatters your leg with a skilled shot.
Moving swiftly, a mhun labourer crushes the side of your leg with the side of his pick.
A mhun knight swings low with his mace, crushing your leg with the sweeping attack.
Moving with catlike agility, the mhun Captain of the Guard sweeps out your legs with the side of his axe.
Gripping his spear in both hands, a mhun warrior rears back and swings down, knocking your legs out from under you.
With a sweeping kick of his leg, a mhun bodyguard trips you up and sends you tumbling to the ground.
Grabbing you with his massive hands, the Great Mhunna picks you up and slams you into the ground.
Turning his amulet quickly, the Great Mhunna covers you in a sticky webbing from within the item.
A mhun demolitionist tosses a lit canister at you, turning his face as it explodes into a pillar of fire.
Wiping a strange liquid on each blade, an elite mhun keeper hacks into you delivering the venoms.
A fairy mistress transfixes you with her stormy grey eyes.
A fairy Lady of Sidhe crafts a globe of flame within her palm and throws it at you. As it explodes on you, serpentine ropes of fire snake from it, wrapping around you tightly.
Gazing at you with his deep golden eyes, a majestic lion blasts you with a ferocious roar.
With a staggering roar, a moon bear clamps his massive snout around your arm with a painful crunch.
A cunning black wolf springs at you with his claws spread, his body slams into you and sends you crashing to the ground in a flurry of fur and flashing fangs.
A slender selkie touches his amulet as a wave of magic pours over you, freezing your muscles painfully.
An Unsidhe Banshee floats towards you and touches your forehead. A jolt of revulsion seeps into you as hellish images fill your mind, paralysing you with horror.
A slender selkie gazes at you with his kind eyes.
Your mind swirls as you feel disinclined to hurt a slender selkie.
With a fearsome neigh, a crazed kelpie rears up and stomps two hooves into your head and torso.
A Fomori of Unsidhe balls a meaty fist up and slams it into your jaw, making your head spin.
Pain and rage wells up in an Unsidhe Banshee's eyes as she opens her mouth wide and emits a deafening and painful wail.
A swamp dweller grabs your head with surprising strength, forcing horrifying images of his life into your mind.
An annoyed look flashes over Rhoswen, a fairy merchant's face as she throws a cloud of iridescent powder over you.
A Fomori of Unsidhe sinks his rotting teeth into your arm, poisoning you as blood drips from his mouth.
Magic dances within a fairy Lady of Sidhe's eyes as she stares at you.
A charging Cyclops lopes towards you, ramming into you with enough force to shatter bones.
A House Tsez air mage weaves her fingers in front of your face, leaving a fascinating trail of colour that you can't help admiring.
Iayh, a mage of House Feranki quickly flings a tiny phial at you that shatters on impact. You scream out in pain as the liquid previously held within the phial burns through your skin.
Ver'osy, the Vertani priestess points a lone finger at you, causing you to erupt in flames.
Iayh, a mage of House Feranki splashes the contents from a large bowl filled with a dark, sticky substance on you. With a sly smile she snaps her fingers as it ignites into flames.
A massive gour knocks you to the ground as he charges into you.
Rohase, Captain of the Guard sideswipes your ankle with the blunt end of her weapon, the force of the blow causing you to tumble to the ground.
A Vertani guard sideswipes your ankle with the blunt end of his weapon, the force of the blow causing you to tumble to the ground.
A massive gour knocks you to the ground as she charges into you.
Vewig, the Magelord of House Tsez pulls at the loose threads from his sleeve, which form long strands that loop around you.
Vewig, the Magelord of House Tsez yanks his arm quickly as if tugging the strands, and you feel the rope-like strands constricting around you tightly.
Taking a quick step back, Daqsool, the Qoul of Tir Murann circles around gaining momentum, coming around opening a deep gash in your arm as his weapons connect, almost severing your limb.
Ver'osy, the Vertani priestess's form grows to a tremendous size, and her eyes flash momentarily with a fiery gleam that leaves you shrinking away in fear
Whipping himself into a fury, a massive gour stampedes tumultuously, trampling over you.
Whipping herself into a fury, a massive gour stampedes tumultuously, trampling over you.
Focusing its eyes upon you, a dream horror paws at you with its diseased claws.
A dream horror strains heavily, a thick noxious fog pouring from its pores and covering your skin in a burning, sticky liquid.
A dream horror swipes at you with one of its tentacles, sending you sprawling to the ground.
A wild lycopod swipes a long corded vine at your feet, sending you sprawling.
A wild lycopod quickly grabs and entangles you with a long corded vine.
A carnivorous lycopod quickly grabs and entangles you with a long corded vine.

Trigger.name: Sensitivity (bypasses deaf)
