regexCodeList.string: ^Raising a shining metallic hand, (.+) points at you and mouths something. Every nerve in your body springs to life and begins to smoulder under your skin\.$
With surprising agility, Rathen, the lonely lover launches a well-aimed kick to your face, momentarily stunning you.
The Faringian historian shrieks wildly and launches a flying kick at your chest, knocking you to the ground.

You clear your mind and begin to run, preparing to jump across the deep, icy waters that pass before you. The ice itself becomes your enemy, making you slip on the ice and fall flat on your face before coming close to the edge.
An arctic wolf leaps at your throat and fastens his teeth around it, biting savagely for a few seconds before releasing you.
With an evil grin on his face, Fircil, the Beduri elder kicks your knee with incredible force, shattering the joint and sending you sprawling.
With amazing strength, Carla, a Faringian pleasure slave takes your arm and locks your elbow before smashing her hand through the joint, rendering the limb useless.
With a look of fear in his eyes, Aarin, the trader thrusts his head into yours, giving you an instant headache.

Aarin, the trader yells out your name, trying to startle you. With a swift flick of his wrist, Aarin, the trader throws some dust into your eyes, blinding you. You feel a sudden force tackle you from behind, leaving you lying on the ground.
Dhormen, the craftsman grabs a log from a nearby pile with both hands. Giving a mighty roar, he whacks you across your face, delivering a pain beyond imagination.
With a sudden lunge, a sabre walrus charges you, knocking you over.
Mala runs at you, then a moment before impact she turns her back toward you to protect her child. The collision knocks you onto your back.
Ne'bula, the headman hooks your leg with his spear and trips you, sending you sprawling.
Stepping forward quickly, a massive wendigo delivers a vicious headbutt to you.
Stepping forward quickly, Kromlech, the bridgekeeper delivers a vicious headbutt to you.
Stepping forward quickly, Shmeeg, an old wendigo delivers a vicious headbutt to you.
Some of the sharp spines shoot out of an ice scarab's legs, hissing through the air and embedding themselves deeply into your neck.

An ice scarab quickly flits inside of your guard and jabs the slender needle-like spines on its legs into your neck. As the venom seeps into your bloodstream, you feel your entire muscular system shut down.
Rearing back, a crystal spider shoots a strong, icy web at you.
An ice golem batters you with its elemental arms.
An ice golem wraps its limbs about you and begins to crush the life from you.
Maklak, the ice wizard points his finger at you, and you are overcome with a deep, invasive cold.
O'ising, Yriluawe shaman utters a string of words, and the world around you seems to slow down.
A'dene, Priestess of the Holy Three directs a dazzling ray of divine light at you.
A'leess, Oracle of the Yriluawe gives you a vengeful stare, and dark images begin to whisper to you from the edges of your mind.
An unspeakable, horrific image rises from the bowels of hell to plague you.
A weathered fisherman scowls and throws a net at you, entangling your limbs.
A giant sea serpent coils his body around yours and sinks into the icy depths of the ocean.
A great grey murre digs her claws deep into your flesh, raking and tearing.
A Colchian warrior flicks his wrist and slams the butt of his sword into the bridge of your nose.
A cloaked assassin leaps from the shadows and buries a dagger to the hilt in your back.
Vendril, Master Assassin leaps from the shadows and buries a dagger to the hilt in your back.

Thorlis, the Warrior Chieftain pulls a glass vial from his robes and throws it at the ground. On impact, the vial shatters and sends shards of glass in all directions as thick blue smoke fills the room.
Vray, a fortress servant pulls a glass vial from his robes and throws it at the ground. On impact, the vial shatters and sends shards of glass in all directions as thick blue smoke fills the room.
Vray, a fortress servant lunges for your throat but trips on his long robes and tumbles to the floor, colliding with your legs and knocking you to the ground.
Frewynne, the Warrior Chieftess slips behind you and knocks you onto your stomach with the butt of her spear.
Siathana, the Healer pulls a pinch of ground leaves from her pouch and blows them in your face. Your body begins to feel strange as you inhale the dust.
Sticky strands of webbing spray out from an ominous lich to cover you.

An unholy frost daemon effortlessly spins both huge blades above his head, then drives forward to plunge them into your stomach with a guttural snarl. Your body grows cold as the enchanted weapons suck hungrily at your lifeforce.
A sturdy troll woman lowers her head and charges at you, slamming powerfully into your abdomen.
A burly troll guard lowers his head and charges at you, slamming powerfully into your abdomen.
A gigantic angler fish hurls itself at you in a vicious frontal attack, connecting painfully with your chest.
Farshen screams with rage and clobbers you viciously around the head with his fists.
Leiga, the Gyrog matriarch balls her hands into fists and batters your head with a series of powerful hook punches.
Leiga, the Gyrog matriarch removes a large beaded necklace, hooks it deftly around your neck, and begins to throttle you with it.
A gigantic angler fish throws itself at you, clamping its sickening jaw tight around your throat.
Leiga, the Gyrog matriarch lowers her head and charges at you, slamming forcefully into your stomach and knocking you to the ground.
Gazing deep into your eyes, the goblin shaman sears you to your soul.
The goblin matron raises her arms and you almost fall to your knees from the stench.
A bare-chested sailor tosses a large, loosely woven net into the air with swift precision. A moment later you find yourself entangled in the ropes.
A sleek mongoose weaves his way back and forth around your feet. Unable to keep up with the creature you stumble over backwards, falling to the ground.
Hefting a coil of rope from the ground, a burly dockhand whips one end out atyou, catching your feet and tripping you up.
Ducking and thrusting his shoulder upward into your gut, Makran, an island trader sends you reeling backwards onto the ground.
With a ground-shaking roar, a Baarian tiger leaps at you, viciously mauling your head with his powerful limbs.
With a ground-shaking roar, a Baarian tiger leaps at you, viciously mauling your head with his powerful limbs.
A red-banded cobra darts forward to strike you, fangs dripping with venom as they sink into your skin. As the snake pulls back you find yourself immobile, paralysed by the venom.
Startled into action, the longest tentacles of a sea nettle wrap tightly aroundyour legs to hinder your movement.
A savannah grizzly rears up on his hind legs, lets loose a great roar, and slams both his broad paws against your head.
A tsetse fly hovers before you while showing his beautiful wings, dazzling you with the swirling, iridescent patterns appearing within them.
A tsetse fly dives toward you, stinging you sharply as you feel an increasing numbness in your body.
Bleating with fear, a woolly barmotez runs around you, strangling you in his umbilical cord.
A green-banded amphisbaena launches himself upward and wraps himself around your neck, squeezing tightly.
With blazing red eyes, the right head of the a green-banded amphisbaena lunges forward and bites you in the leg.
With a hiss, the left head of a green-banded amphisbaena darts forward and bites you in the leg.
A savannah grizzly swings his sharp claws at you in a massive swipe and knocks you on the ground.

Trigger.name: savannah lion pwn attack - I want this!

regexCodeList.string: With a powerful push from his hind legs, a savannah lion soars through the air and lands on you with a bone-breaking crash.
A savannah lioness lunges forward and bites you painfully with her large teeth.
A savannah lioness pounces on you, knocking the wind from your lungs.
A savannah lioness grabs your leg between her teeth and shakes you around like a rag doll.
A grubby child looks at you imploringly with tear-filled eyes, stripping you of all aggression.
A bear hunter jabs his spear between your legs, causing you to trip and fall to the ground.
With a roar of defiance a bear hunter shoves his spear through your abdomen, impaling you utterly.
With a mighty swing of his fist, Vanac, the leatherworker hits you full in the chin with an uppercut, sending you sprawling.
Belen, the shaman wriggles his fingers, upon which a green ray of light shoots out and hits you in the chest.
Belen, the shaman shreds your flesh with his long, filthy fingernails.
Thaleia twirls her dagger lightning-quick between her fingers, dazzling you with it.
Lyen, a chubby innkeeper raises his club and, with an overhead swing, smashes it down on your wrist.
Lyen, a chubby innkeeper swings a wooden club and smashes it on your head.
Melancton, the Mayor grabs you by the shoulders and slams his head against yours.
With a bone-crunching sound, a wiry fisherman kicks you in the knee.
A wiry fisherman snarls and swings his bucket against your head.
A dark arachnoi man shoots out a mass of sticky webbing at you.
A dark arachnoi woman shoots out a mass of sticky webbing at you.
Istishia, the Arachnoi Queen shoots out a mass of sticky webbing at you.
A midnight stag lowers his regal head and charges you, his antlers knocking you to the ground as they gore your flesh.

Pointing his staff at you with a cruel smile, Ilundien, sylvan of the shadowed forest gestures emphatically. The power of the staff lifts you off your feet, holding you helpless in the air.With a contemptuous flick of his wrist, Ilundien, sylvan of the shadowed forest gestures once more and you are flung to the ground, colliding painfully with the earth.

A midnight stag gallops around you in a circle three times, nickering softly. In response, the earth of the Darkenwood churns and tree roots burst from the earth, entangling you and dragging you to the ground.
Catching you on his mighty antlers, a midnight stag tosses you high into the air. An unpleasant 'crack' is heard as you fall awkwardly on one leg.

Planting the Staff of the Shadowed Forest deep in the earth before him, Ilundien, sylvan of the shadowed forest shouts an imprecation to the skies.In response, a shaft of amaranthine brilliance streams from the implanted staff to strike you, the magic transfixing you in pain and wonder.

Ilundien, sylvan of the shadowed forest whispers a single word and emanations of shadow spiral from the staff he wields to surround you.As the tendrils of darkness envelop your body, your mind is cast into confusion and despair.
An alluring dryad raises her arms high in the air above her head as hundreds of vines and roots spring from the ground to entangle you in their grasp.
Wielding his weapon above his head, Gaderian, the mage of Narcisse chants and aims his staff at you.
A scorching bolt of pure fire shoots from the staff, hitting you in the chest.
Zerina, elder of the Angai lowers her head slightly, her eyes glowing a deep shade of red.
Suddenly, a bolt of blood-red light shoots out of Zerina, elder of the Angai's eyes, igniting your skin.
Chanting in an obscure language, Olanri, sage of Narcisse stares intensely at you.
Suddenly, a strong, fluid current appears, knocking you painfully to the floor.
Shrieking horrifically, Nuxila, Chieftess of the Angai smacks you on the shin, shattering your leg in two.
Nuxila, Chieftess of the Angai chants quietly at you, waving her staff as she does so. As the chant progresses, a small ball of light begins to form at the tip of the staff.
Finally, Nuxila, Chieftess of the Angai nods her head at you, and the ball of light slams into your skin, melting your flesh slightly.
Moving his tail swiftly, Laposi, leader of the Hanai creates a powerful current in the water and directs it towards you.
Crashing loudly into you, the current knocks you off your feet, leaving you unable to stand.
Tendrils of unnatural blue flame lash forward from the pale form of an ethereal spirit wolf, wrapping around your body and infecting your mind.
An ethereal spirit wolf leaps forward at you, teeth bared. As he makes contact, his pale blue flames flicker into orange brilliance and wrap around you in a terrible blaze.
Drusalor, a solemn old forestal swings his rough staff through the air in a graceful arc that knocks you off your feet.
Cacalos, the mad inhales deeply, his chest swelling with air.
Opening his mouth wide, Cacalos, the mad exhales a sudden burst of white fire that swells out to scorch your flesh.
Cacalos, the mad gazes into your eyes with frenzied intensity. As the haunting whiteness of his pupils fills your consciousness, you feel your body stiffen into paralysis.
Jahalen, Master of Sparrow's Rest inhales deeply, his chest swelling, while his steely grey eyes remain fixed upon you with unnerving intensity.
A swirling cloud of fire and ash billows out from Jahalen, Master of Sparrow's Rest's flared nostrils, briefly engulfing you in searing heat.
Theralan, a jovial druid seizes your arm with incredibly strong jaws, applying pressure until the bones snap with a sickening crunch.
Theralan, a jovial druid throws back his head and roars fiercely at you, the sound rumbling out to echo menacingly through the area.
Stepping forward, Lurac, a refined and elegant druid brushes long, white fingers across your forehead. Before you can react, a freezing cold lances through your head and your vision clouds with pain.
Lurac, a refined and elegant druid's eyes narrow into gleaming blue slits. Opening his mouth, he exhales a freezing cloud of icy breath that swirls around you and chills you to the bone.
Moving to face you, Haslac, a scruffy-looking druid throws back his head and releases a long, mournful howl that sends chills down your spine and flusters your wits.
Terane, the Sylvan raises a hand towards you and blasts you with cold, frigid air.
Sweeping his long tail around your legs, Urthug Vilmore pulls you down with his tail onto the ground. The same appendage slams down into your face an instant after.
Robusto stamps a cloven hoof on the ground then charges at you, head lowered, skewering you upon his short horns and knocking you to the ground.
Moving with unexpected swiftness, Lisse Schmidt tumbles to the ground and into your legs, tripping you down before rolling up gracefully onto her feet.
Urthug Vilmore sucks in a huge lungful of air and blasts his fiery breath at you.
Spinning around deftly, Hermann Schmidt snaps out with a sharp kick to your knee, and you hear bones crunch.
Melodramus, the bard sings an irritating, mind-numbing ditty at you.
Fire jets from the maw of a thoqqua, the blast spreading over your body.
Burrowing into the ground, a thoqqua explodes from beneath your feet, showering you painfully with rocks and fire.
A mountain drake opens his gaping mouth, exhaling an icy blast at you.
Simmons, captain of the lighthouse sweeps his leg beneath you, knocking you off your feet.
Turning away from you, a sea lion bull knocks you over with a swipe of his powerful tail.
Turning away from you, a female sea lion knocks you over with a swipe of her powerful tail.
Turning away from you, an ancient sea lion knocks you over with a swipe of his powerful tail.
Turning away from you, a scarred sea lion knocks you over with a swipe of his powerful tail.
A giant vampire spider scurries quickly up a strand of web before dropping down atop you, knocking you to the ground.
An albino vampire spider scurries quickly up a strand of web before dropping down atop you, knocking you to the ground.
A vampire spider scurries quickly up a strand of web before dropping down atop you, knocking you to the ground.
A giant vampire spider circles you as she sprays sticky strands of spider silk to entangle you.
An albino vampire spider circles you as he sprays sticky strands of spider silk to entangle you.
A vampire spider circles you as he sprays sticky strands of spider silk to entangle you.
A giant vampire spider launches at you, sinking her fangs into your flesh.
An albino vampire spider launches at you, sinking his fangs into your flesh.
A vampire spider hatchling darts up to you, sinking his fangs into your exposed flesh.
A vampire spider launches at you, sinking his fangs into your flesh.
A young buckawn witchdoctor reaches forward with both hands and grabs your legs, shrivelling them both within his grasp.
Orin Foehammer slashes viciously into your arm with his axe, breaking it easily.
The wind howls a strong gust, and you hear a harsh splitting sound reverberate throughout the air. A tree crashes toward you, hitting you and sending you sprawling.
An Umbrinite trainee sweeps his spear at your feet, knocking you to the ground.
Master Healer Rivtan grabs the lower end of his staff and spins around in a circle with the staff pointed outwards, sweeping you off your feet.
Master Healer Rivtan takes his staff and deftly smacks you in the front of your knee. You stumble to the ground in pain, clutching at your throbbing knee.
Major Poatril twirls his net above his head before casting it over your head.
High General Boracin points his blade at you, sending a mass of magical netting spiralling towards you.
An Umbrinite crossbowman lights a glistening bolt before firing it into your chest.
Rising from the depths of his throat, an Umbrinite raider focuses his warlike cries at you.
Rising from the depths of her throat, an Umbrinite raider focuses her warlike cries at you.
Feinting low with his blade, Major Avanguird smashes his mace into the side of your head.
Master Healer Rivtan takes an old vial of restoration and cracks it over your head, causing your vision to blur and stunning you.
Wiping some poisons on his blades, an Umbrinite raider slashes you once with each one.
Uncorking a vial, an Umbrinite combat medic tosses it into your eyes, blinding you.
Nocking a green bolt in his weapon, an Umbrinite crossbowman fires it into you.
Instead of nocking the arrow to his bow, he quickly stabs you with the envenomed tip.
Colonel Meliane plunges her blade deep into your arm.
Lieutenant Mavlait pricks you twice in rapid succession with his dirk.
Major Klione balls up one fist and hammerfists you.
Whirling about quickly, Major Klione delivers a massive roundhouse kick to your head.
Shouting a war cry, Major Poatril rams his trident deep into you, impaling you with the weapon.
Colonel Survane lowers his shoulder and charges, knocking you to the ground.
Spinning his blade in his hand, High General Boracin smashes the flat of the hilt into the side of your head.
Blades flashing, Freyil Marteila punctures you with her daggers.
Vishengo growls an incantation and makes a quick gesture to you, palms open. A sudden force knocks into you, then through you, to leave you shuddering.
Sidi, the Elder growls an incantation and makes a quick gesture to you, palms open. A sudden force knocks into you, then through you, to leave you shuddering.
Nadja, the Elder growls an incantation and makes a quick gesture to you, palms open. A sudden force knocks into you, then through you, to leave you shuddering.
Oaste reacts with a quick, powerful side kick that causes you to fall to one knee.
Vedel, a woodworker reacts with a quick, powerful side kick that causes you to fall to one knee.
Elena, a gypsy woman reacts with a quick, powerful side kick that causes you to fall to one knee.
Oaste strikes you with a vicious kick to your knee, then lands a heavy punch in your abdomen.
Elena, a gypsy woman strikes you with a vicious kick to your knee, then lands a heavy punch in your abdomen.
Vedel, a woodworker strikes you with a vicious kick to your knee, then lands a heavy punch in your abdomen.
A diminutive fairy fixes you with a steady stare, the blue of her eyes expanding in your vision, captivating you until you cannot move.
The basilisk turns its infamous gaze to you and suddenly your body refuses to respond to your commands.
Calling upon her intimate link with the forests, Terpsichore, spirit of the Aalen Forest summons a whirlwind of leaves to swirl about you, leaving your head spinning.
Stretching her fingers outward, Terpsichore, spirit of the Aalen Forest coaxes a tangle of vines and branches from the surrounding forest to hinder you.
At a gesture from Terpsichore, spirit of the Aalen Forest, a thick tree root protrudes from the ground and trips you off your feet.
Terpsichore, spirit of the Aalen Forest raises her voice in an ethereal chant to the forest that settles a fog of utter confusion upon you.
Sweeping his pickaxe in a wild arc, a bloodstained miner catches your head a glancing blow with the thick, wooden shaft.
An alert dwarven guard brings the butt of his axe down heavily upon your head, the room momentarily spinning.

Trigger.name: miner blackout prone
Trigger.script: svo.valid.proper_stun() svo.valid.simpleprone() -- blackout gets autodetected by the system

regexCodeList.string: Cackling hellishly, a dirt-encrusted miner swings his pickaxe vertically, smashing his weapon into your groin.
Cackling hellishly, a young dwarven miner swings his pickaxe vertically, smashing his weapon into your groin.
Cackling hellishly, a dishevelled dwarven miner swings his pickaxe vertically, smashing his weapon into your groin.
Cackling hellishly, a bloodstained miner swings his pickaxe vertically, smashing his weapon into your groin.
Cackling hellishly, a blood-soaked dwarven miner swings his pickaxe vertically, smashing his weapon into your groin.
A wild, frenzied look flickering across his face, a delirious miner sinks his teeth into you.
Lunging at you ferociously, Brok, the Blackfire shaman wrenches open your mouth and forces a small amount of vile liquid down your throat.
The ground beneath you heaves and rocks violently, slamming you onto the floor.
Several thorny vines lash out from a hulking bush of hogsweed, tightly ensnaring your limbs.
Booming with maniacal laughter, a burly troll dweller stomps upon your foot, breaking the bones within.
A grotesque xorani inmate crushes your leg with a hammer-like blow from his heavy, spiked tail.
A young shaman inmate begins to sing softly to her doll, as a hypnotic lullaby sung in deep, resonating tones fills your head and your eyes flutter drowsily.
Puncturing your skin with the end of a filthy needle, Darien, the shock therapist unleashes a noxious poison into your blood, watching fiendishly as your limbs stiffen.
Lowering his head, a sneering psychopathic inmate runs towards you, knocking you back with the impact of his skull.
Bringing its spinerettes around to face you, a spinorthos shoots a spray of sticky silk at you, entangling you.
Deftly using its spinerettes to weave silk, a giant water strider ensnares you in a tangled web.
Pointing a crooked finger at you, Veshina blasts you with a freezing spell.
Sarat, Mistress of Necromancy points her glowing fingertips at you and releases a stream of red energy, engulfing you and setting you alight.
Rushing at you with lightning speed, an amorak smashes into your legs and knocks you over.
A giant zelahia flies straight into your torso, knocking you over.
Shrieking shrilly, Trisal, an Isaian woman gives you a fierce shove, knocking you over.
As a snow-white ennelin sinks her teeth into your skin, you feel a chill run through your body.
With a piercing scream, an Isaian boy shoots you with a thin stream of freezing water.
With a piercing scream, an Isaian girl shoots you with a thin stream of freezing water.
With painful accuracy, an Isaian woman throws a ball of freezing water at you.
Forming a ball of freezing water in the air, Meste, an Isaian youth throws it at you with surprising force.
With an intense scowl, Trisal, an Isaian woman forms a ball of freezing water and hurls it at you.
With a high-pitched scream, Peyna, the acolyte blasts you with a ball of freezing water.
A thin layer of ice forms around you as a moenai touches its vibrating mass to your torso.
Screaming shrilly, Hesta, the Elder blasts you with a thin stream of freezing water.
Chiale, the Alchemist throws a bottle of blue potion at your feet, which explodes upon impact and freezes the water around you.
With grim determination, Chaen Naelye blasts you with a thin stream of freezing water.
Chanting just under his breath, Yiastel Tenye blasts you with a thin stream of icy water.
Dliste Seye blasts you with a thin stream of freezing water.
With a slight grimace, Heche, Keeper of the Gates hurls a ball of freezing water at you.
Her commanding voice echoing throughout the chamber, Xeyana, the Priestess freezes you with a stream of bright blue light.
Wielding a chair menacingly, Hesta, the Elder smashes it into your leg, causing it to snap with a sharp crack.
Chiale, the Alchemist forms a ball of ice and throws it at you, smashing your arm.
A transparent bubblefish charges straight into you, knocking you off balance and stunning you!
Producing a weathered scroll, Venasia Enverren speaks the words written upon it while pointing at you, and an intense pressure builds in your head.
Hissing ferociously, a salamandrin servant throws up a cloud of dust in your face, blinding you.
Derthesha Enverren twists her cane between your feet. You trip and fall!
Launching itself onto you, a poharaehe knocks you breathless to the ground and smothers you with its immense weight.
Tunai, a spear-wielding hunter drops his shoulder low and barges into you, knocking you to the ground and stunning you momentarily.
With both fists swinging together, a poharaehe lands a deadening blow to both sides of your head, stunning you.
With a brisk sidekick to the chest, a male villager knocks the wind out of you.
Reversing his spear, Piriana, Keeper of the Gate drives the shaft of the spear into your chest, leaving you breathless.
You feel a slight tingling sensation as a wasp drone stabs you with its stinger and the venom takes its hold on you.
A wasp soldier stabs you in the arm, its stinger piercing deep into the flesh.
Your muscles lock up as the venom takes its toll.
As a wasp queen stabs you with her barbed stinger, the searing venom courses through your veins and the blood drains from your face.
Paehe, a small boy grabs a fist full of dirt and throws it into your eyes, blinding you.
Hanen, a worried villager leaps at you and tackles you painfully to the ground.
Maihiri, Chieftain of the Haraekanewa raises his staff high before whipping it down onto your arm with surprising speed.
Holding out his staff, Maihiri, Chieftain of the Haraekanewa spins low, bringing the staff crashing against your legs.
You hear a bone crack as you fall to the ground.
A dock worker pulls a long, heavy chain from his belt, swinging it above his head before launching it at your ankles. Your feet become entangled in the chain, and you fall heavily to the ground.

Jansen, the chief maintenance worker pulls a long, heavy chain from his belt, swinging it above his head before launching it at your ankles. Your feet become entangled in the chain, and you fall heavily to the ground.
Moving quickly, Dyphangi, the tavern cook sweeps his leg around, disrupting your balance and sending you crashing to the floor.
Shrieking in righteous fury, Marella, the housewife rushes bodily toward you like an unstoppable tartan juggernaut and sends you crashing to the floor.
A cave crab scuttles headlong at you. He slams into you, causing you to slip and fall to the ground.
A sea carp propels his powerful body into you with a flick of his tail, sending you toppling into the roaring currents and sharp rocks.
Nicholon, the harbourmaster picks up a jar of ink from his desk and dashes its contents into your face. The ink burns and renders you blind.
A sea carp pokes his head out of the turbulent waters and spits a jet of saltwater square into your eyes, blinding you.
Nicholon, the harbourmaster reaches back and snatches a priceless historical artefact from a shelf, hurling it into your face. It deals you a stunning blow on the forehead.
The kraken flails its tentacles wildly about itself, gathering everything in its reach into its deadly, crushing embrace.
A fearsome kraken releases a cloud of ink into the water, numbing your senses.
A corpulent rilma worm sends you crashing to the floor as it grabs your legs in its mandibles and pulls them out from under you.
Pain lances through your body as a corpulent rilma worm dashes past you and scratches you with its poisonous bristles.
Your limbs lock up as a greyish-green culuma drops on you from the ceiling, knocking you to the ground as its appendages form a leech-like grip on you.
Covering you with its massive bulk, a greyish-green culuma crushes the life out of you.
You fall to the ground and thrash uncontrollably as a hideous nel'dorath's eyes flare with an intensity that bores deep into your brain.
You reel as a fearsome cave hunter deafens you with an ear-piercing screech.
A menacing gargoyle slams his massive tail into you hard, sending you sprawling.
Whipping its arms about in a frenzy, a jagged quorin batters you to the ground with a flurry of blows.
All sensation fades to blackness as a jagged quorin transfixes you with its mesmerising gaze.
A feral gangrel sinks his fangs into your flesh, delivering saliva that begins to sear its way through your skin and render you immobile.
Yurasta Tarcalion, the Thaumaturge snaps his fingers together in front of you.
In an instant, you feel your body being blasted with energy, and the sound of bone breaking rings in your ears.
The harpy swoops down, smashing its bulk into you and knocking you painfully to the ground.
A dwarf man cocks back his arm and swings his axe ferociously into your leg.
A menacing henchman lowers his head and runs at you, smashing you to the ground with his thick skull.
Khovsgol, the Black removes a throwing knife from his belt and sends it speeding at you. His aim true, the knife buries itself into your gut up to the hilt.
Extending his two front claws, a massive spider crab uses his enormous reach and pummels you brutally with double blows.

With astounding speed, Master Mascon plunges a hand straight into your unresisting chest with ease. Your heart spasms in agony as its shadowy fingers clench the very life from it before releasing its grip. You fall to the ground, stunned.
A Penumbran fiend glances at you with a penetrating stare, its eyes burning with a madness that sets your mind aflame with insanity.
A Penumbran fiend spouts boiling shadow from its torso, igniting your skin with dark fire.
A murkworm sprays a tarry substance over your skin. It turns slick instantly, covering your body in an oily sheen.
A frost-mottled crab grabs your leg with a pincer, closing it slowly to snap the bone in two with immense strength.
A frost-mottled crab raises a pincer and pierces your flesh, sending a burning sensation up your leg.
A murkworm shakes his body, sending a fog of black fumes towards you that clouds your mind and scalds your skin.
Raising one eyebrow at you with effortless disdain, Methats, the Divine Wind swings the barbed end of his silver mace to bear upon your shoulder, as the sound of bone splintering fills the air.
Throwing her weight to the side, the Flowing Robes Champion brings her twin blades crashing down upon your arm in a single devastating blow.
Unsteady on his makeshift wooden leg, Methats, the Divine Wind bludgeons you over the head with his silver mace, restoring his balance.
Balancing unsteadily on his wooden peg, Methats, the Divine Wind swings his huge sword in a low arc that slices deep into your legs.
Snarling furiously, Kuralil, the Light-Footed whips a venom-coated dagger from its place at his belt and stabs it into your side.
Moving toward you with breathtaking speed, the Flowing Robes Champion's body increases in size, reaching monstrous proportions as her robes engulf your vision and leave you in darkness.
Her eyes unnervingly calm, the Flowing Robes Champion suddenly sweeps your legs out from under you and brings the hilt of her blade slamming down against your exposed temple in a fierce blow.
Atlantia's left hook comes out of nowhere, laying you flat on your back.
With a swift movement of her knee, Atlantia strikes at the most sensitive part of your anatomy.
Stepping back, Atlantia nocks an arrow. With one swift, smooth movement, she draws the bow and /nlooses, the shaft pinning you securely.
Unfixing one foot from the floor, a crazed prison guard sweeps his leg around, catching you behind the knees and sending you toppling to the ground.
Gnral, the taryen chieftain's cloudy eyes flare bright red for a moment, and an arc of energy leaps from his eyes to yours, filling your mind with fear and confusion.
The eerie red light in a taryen man's eyes builds up until an arc of energy leaps out and connects with your own eyes.
A taryen man lifts himself up onto two limbs and uses his front limbs to squeeze your body,splintering bones
Gnral, the taryen chieftain rushes at you, smashing you to the ground with his massive limbs.
Quickly whirling his staff, Cassian, a blue-robed mage painfully crashes it into the back of your leg.
A majestic moose looks you straight in the eyes as he charges at you, his antlers connecting painfully to your chest and knocking you to the ground.
A cowled initiate weaves his hands, blasting you with a foul spell.
You cannot contain the convulsions in your stomach any longer and double over, retching violently.You cannot contain the convulsions in your stomach any longer and double over, retching violently.
Inish, the head cultist uses his last breath to curse you with your own stupidity!
A crazed ritualist gives a maniacal cackle and summons a wave of fiery magic, blasting it at you and setting you on fire!
Her colossal form towering above you, a gargantuan orbweaver attempts to crush you with massive disjointed legs. Inadvertently, she covers you in thick, sticky webbing that hinders your escape.

Tendrils of silk lash out toward you from a gargantuan orbweaver, binding you in a tight embrace. You are flung across the room with violent force, slamming into a wall with a sickening crunch and cracking your spine.
Wrapping his arms around you in a crushing bear hug, Oeru, a burly young gnoll attempts to squeeze the life out of you.
A fierce gnoll sentinel latches his jaws around your arm and grins with glee at the sound of your bones snapping within his maw.
Summoning all her strength, Chena, the healer grabs a large empty cauldron from its hook upon the wall and swings it toward your head in a wide arc.
Chena, the healer murmurs a vicious hex under her breath and tosses a green cloud of mixed herbs over you.

Grandmaster Kevadrin grabs your forearm and begins to twist, forcing your shoulder into a joint lock, sending a piercing pain throughout your body. Pressing harder, he causes your shoulder to separate.

regexCodeList.string: Suddenly reversing his glaive, an elite guardsman skilfully smashes your kneecap with its weighted foot, sending you crashing to the floor in agony.

Lashing out at your arms, Kimitia, a Quisalis Assassin wraps her whip around your wrists and pulls you hard to the ground.
The large frame of a large hound slams into you at full speed, knocking you off your feet.
An elderly mage whirls in a circle, sending a massive blast of wind through the room that knocks you down.
A female mage whirls in a circle, sending a massive blast of wind through the room that knocks you down.
Lifting up her massive boot, Ilucara Pelendur, Advisor to the Shah thrusts her foot into your gut, knocking you to the ground.
An ice wyrm coils its long tail around you, crushing your body within before tossing you aside.
A tundra wolf leaps onto you and knocks you over, repeatedly savaging your face with wicked claws.
An arctic wolf leaps onto you and knocks you over, repeatedly savaging your face with wicked claws.
A tundra mercenary whips a swirl of cold snow into your face before sweeping your legs.
Snarling in anger, a massive wendigo rushes toward you, bowling you over and smashing his club repeatedly into your exposed limbs.
Tossing his club aside, a massive wendigo grabs you with a vice-like grip and easily lifts you up, then brutally slams you into the ground.
The tentacles of a monstrous septacean flail wildly in all directions, slapping against you and sending you reeling backwards.
You find yourself grasped ungently, thrust down through the whirlpool, and spat out again upon dry land.
The staff in Jerak, Captain of the Guard's hands becomes a blur as he slams it into your head three times in rapid succession, then finishes with a vicious thrust to your chest.
The ground beneath you begins to shake and it sends all around it tumbling to the ground.
A flesh-eating slug rushes forward and bodily slams his bulk into you, knocking you to the ground.
His mouth moving rapidly, Avel, a hepatizon malagma gestures at you and you drop to the ground, all of your limbs suddenly heavy beyond belief.

Black mists leap and writhe in response to a short, shrill chant from Belladona's lips. Inclining her head effortlessly, she sends the tendrils to sear your flesh, and your limbs shatter like glass under the fell caress.
Growling loudly, an enormous hound leaps at you and sinks his fangs into your arm, the saliva dripping from his mouth burning the wound.
With a wicked gleam in her eyes, Ulgase, the lich crone snaps her bony finger in front of you and the world suddenly seems to slow down.
A silver spider sinks its fangs into your body, you scream out in agony as a vicious venom tears through your body.
A silver spider spins around rearing up to spray you with a sticky webbing, which quickly entangles your limbs.
Deftly working her nimble fingers, Tsalinas, the weaver binds you in a complex weave of colourful thread.
Kassan, the healer raises his arms with an angry glare, and thorny vines rise from the forest floor to entangle you.
Ta'lissu, the tattoo artist snarls and snatches your wrist, twisting it behind your back with a powerful jerk and snapping the bone.
With a thunderous roar, a formidable jade sea serpent slithers around you and attempts to snap you in half with his powerful muscles.
A pair of grasping hands grabs one of your calves and twists your leg as hard as possible. You feel an agonising pain and the bone snaps, tearing out of the flesh.
Wrapping steel fingers around your arm, Grollum, the Sentinel crushes it effortlessly.
A two-headed ogre brings his mace crashing down upon you, his other head whispering a chant that paralyzes you moments before it crunches into your arm.
Your muscles stiffen and lock as Belladona, Queen of Vampires gazes at you hypnotically.
A wire-frame man whips a flexible length of wire around you, binding it tightly around you.
You feel your muscles tightening as a wire-frame man scratches his claws into you.
An atavian farmer fires a well-aimed kick at your leg, and you hear a sickening crunch.

Trigger.name: Lupine Hunting grounds paralyse and prone

regexCodeList.string: With a deft manoeuvre a massive varkha whips his spear through the air slicing a deep gash in your chest then quickly thrusts the spear forward penetrating your gut with ease as the barbed head tears the wound open, as blood gushes from the wounds.
Opening its giant mouth a massive gohlbrorn clamps its sharp bony teeth into you ripping out a large chunk of flesh.
You fall to the floor, face distorted in agony as a statue of a haggard beggar crushes both your legs under his enormous foot.
You hear the snapping of bone as a statue of a haggard beggar grabs you with both arms and crushes you in a tight embrace.
A giant scorpion skitters forward and barrels into your kneecaps, sending you to the ground.
With an enraged howl, the king ape grabs your legs and lifts you above his head, whirling you about before effortlessly tossing you into the underbrush.
Charging toward you with a shriek, the Vultubus tramples over your body, pounding you into the ground with his massive weight.
Rocketing through the water, a redfin tuna rams into your arm, splintering the bone with agonising force.
Slipping a long tentacle around your lower body, a monstrous septacean slowly begins to squeeze, and you feel the bones of your legs crack under the intense pressure.
A school of hungry fish nibbles on the remains of Qwindor, who has succumbed to the teeth and tentacles of a monstrous septacean.
With an invigorated shout, a Quisalis sentry hacks into your arm with a vicious swing of his halberd.
A noxious fume squirts out of a decaying zombie, making your jaw tighten and knocking you to the ground.
Yuthka's eyes light up like burning coals as she lowers her head to your level, staring at you directly. You feel your muscles tighten right before you lose all feeling in your body.
Turning quickly, Yuthka, the daemonic serpent shakes herself off and lets fly the acidic mucous that seeps from her body. The mucous attaches to your skin and causes it to bubble and boil.

Yuthka, the daemonic serpent races toward you with unbelievable speed. She encircles your body, coiling around you until your bones begin to shatter from the pressure. Suddenly she releases you, though your body cannot tell the difference.
A deadly obsidian scorpion shoots both pincers forward in a double attack, plunging their razor-sharp points deep into you.

Trigger.name: UW Scorpion break
Trigger.script: -- they show lines now svo.valid.simpleunknowncrippledlimb() svo.valid.simpleunknowncrippledlimb()

regexCodeList.string: A deadly obsidian scorpion reaches out, grabs you in one of his huge pincers, and squeezes brutally.
A rotting zombie falls upon you heavily, snapping bones.
A steel-encased Death Knight pauses momentarily and emits a pulse of blinding, red light, taking away your balance.
The Ur'Vampire Gerzson bows his head, slumping forward as if in deep thought. You feel drawn, thinned, and the world around you speeds up noticeably.
The Ur'Vampire Prioska bows her head, slumping forward as if in deep thought. You feel drawn, thinned, and the world around you speeds up noticeably.
The Ur'Vampire Gerzson twirls quickly as a black mist rises from the ground in response. The mist moves quickly to envelope you with its ghastly choking fumes.
Fafnir, Lord of the Dark Court utters a quick word as the marble beneath you wavers, turning to a sticky liquid which quickly entraps your feet.
Faylinn, Lady of Unsidhe Court showers you with sparkling fairy dust.
A deep voice whispers through your mind as Oberion, King of the Fairies stares intently at you, his magnetic eyes making your body stiffen and mind go blank.
Oberion, King of the Fairies pinches a handful of iridescent powder from his satchel and blows it at you, causing your senses to whirl from a kaleidoscope of colour.
A vomiting miner catches you off balance as he feebly thrusts his pickaxe at you.
Flipping his pickaxe over in his hands, Glath Ironhammer, Leader of the Bloodstone clan smashes the butt hard against your temple.
Swinging her pickaxe wildly, Grelda Stonefist smashes the tip into your groin, incapacitating you.
Flipping his pickaxe over in his hands, Bartok Stonefist, Leader of the Blackfire clan smashes the butt hard against your temple.
Swinging her pickaxe wildly, Breana Ironhammer smashes the tip into your groin, incapacitating you.
Grasping his weapon tightly in both hands, Bartok Stonefist, Leader of the Blackfire clan swings the pickaxe at your knees, sweeping you off your feet.
Lashing out with her pickaxe Grelda Stonefist smashes her weapon into your kneecap.
Lashing out with her pickaxe Breana Ironhammer smashes her weapon into your kneecap.
Grasping his weapon tightly in both hands, Glath Ironhammer, Leader of the Bloodstone clan swings the pickaxe at your knees, sweeping you off your feet.
With her dying breath Grelda Stonefist utters a vile curse at you.
Lunging at you ferociously, Brok, the Blackfire shaman wrenches open your mouth and forces a small amount of vile liquid down your throat.
Lunging at you ferociously, Thraken, the Bloodstone shaman wrenches open your mouth and forces a small amount of vile liquid down your throat.
Wrapping his tentacles around your legs, a tentacled polyp causes you to come crashing to the floor, your legs entangled with his bizarre appendages.
Sticky strands of webbing spray out from a winged worker sylphid beetle's abdomen, entangling you in the strong threads.
A putrid green crab jumps onto your back and bites at your flesh.
A sense of exhaustion suddenly overcomes you, causing you to take a nap.
A reedy green buom wraps his branches around your legs, crushing them as he does so.
A reedy green buom whips his branches around your legs, throwing you to the floor with a loud bang.
Slamming his body into yours, an energetic red turtle knocks you painfully to the floor.
You suddenly feel yourself go weak at the knees, falling painfully to the floor.
A putrid green crab snaps violently at your feet, causing you to fall to the floor.
An azure koparfish slams his body violently into yours, causing you to fall to the floor.
A disgruntled salt miner kicks out at you, the hefty shackle around his ankle smashing into the back of your knee.
Anwell, commander of the prison guard sends you sprawling as he drives a vicious punch into your gut, followed by a brutal kick to the back of your knee.
As it leaps onto a patch of exposed flesh, a small fireback frog's poisons seep into your body, and the world blurs.
As it leaps onto a patch of exposed flesh, a small fireback frog's poisons seep into your body, and the world blurs.
Expertly throwing you off balance with a kick to the chest, a proud ducal guard brings the butt of his sword slamming down on your skull in a fierce blow.
A winged worker sylphid beetle flares his wings, sending gusts of warm air at your face.
Snatching your leg with a crushing, jagged grip, a one-eyed freshwater alligator drags you down into the depths.
White-hot pain accompanies a loud 'CRACK!' as a grey-scaled roopimaya collides with your leg, breaking it.
An energetic red turtle slams his body into your leg, shattering it in the process.
A sinister glubber claws viciously at your leg, severing the joints.
Wrapping his form around your leg, an enormous anaconda squeezes tightly, causing it to break in a number of places.
Having wrapped his form around your leg, a multicoloured boa constrictor squeezes tightly, causing it to break.
Bending and swinging in one smooth motion, Duke Semiro sweeps his iron mace into your leg with a fierce blow.
A white-striped frog's powerful jump propels it onto your arm, and an electric tingling sensation races throughout your body from the point of contact.
As a white-striped frog hops onto an area of bare flesh, your body is seized by numbing, paralytic pain.
You suddenly feel your muscles freeze up, stopping you in your steps.
You suddenly feel your muscles sieze up, leaving you unable to move.
You suddenly begin to feel your limbs seizing up, leaving you unable to move.
A multicoloured boa constrictor bites you firmly in the shin, causing your muscles to seize up.
A bunyip slams himself into your leg, managing to simultaneously shatter the bone and leave numerous deep cuts, each infected with poison.
Opening its mouth and expanding its bulbous throat, a white-striped frog gives a loud, resonant croak.
Opening its mouth and expanding its bulbous throat, a long-legged monkey frog gives a loud, resonant croak.
Opening its mouth and expanding its bulbous throat, a small fireback frog gives a loud, resonant croak.
Snapping her large bill, a blue heron assaults you, crushing your arm in the process.
A sinister glubber claws viciously at your arm, severing the joints.
A proud ducal guard whirls, seizing your arm and twisting it backward until the bone snaps with a sickening crunch.
The Captain of the Guard swings his sword into your arm with terrifying force, cleaving flesh and bone in a single blow.
Effortlessly swinging his massive broadsword in a wide arc, Anwell, commander of the prison guard slashes deeply into your arm.
A horned viper's head darts forward suddenly, sinking huge, sharp fangs deep into your side.
An energetic red turtle scrapes his nails across your skin, leaving venom dripping from the lacerations.
You suddenly feel venom running through your veins.
Leaping nimbly towards you, a thornback frog scrapes a large chunk of skin from your torso, leaving venom dripping from the wounds.
Staring intensely, a bunyip slams himself into you, leaving numerous scratches on your skin dripping with some sort of venom.
A putrid green crab bites at your feet, leaving a number of visible marks.Suddenly, you feel a strong venom running through your veins.
You suddenly feel unable to harm anyone or anything.
You suddenly feel a very powerful venom run through your veins.
Suddenly, you begin to feel a burning sensation run through your veins.
A sinister glubber scrapes his nails across your eyes, leaving you unable to see.
You suddenly feel your mental capacity lower.
Why must everything be so hard to understand?
Suddenly, you begin to feel your grip on reality fading.
A sense of panic suddenly overcomes you, leaving you unaware of what to do next.
Samial, a sleek Rajamala throws back his head and releases a fierce, rumbling roar that fills you with an ancient, primal urge to flee in terror.
Staring intensely at you, a multicoloured boa constrictor causes your skin to spontaneously combust.
In one swift motion, a bearded cook splashes a bottle of cooking oil over your body and ignites you with a lit match.
Quickly yanking his tongs from the forge, Emmith, a sullen blacksmith showers you with burning hot cinders.
Jadorno, a cloaked nobleman plunges a hand into a pouch at his belt, swiftly pulling it out and extending his arm to hurl a handful of noxious green powder into your face.
You shriek with horror as Daerlain, an elderly noblewoman lays her shrivelled hands upon your temples and visions of chaos and madness swirl unchecked through your helpless mind.
The fortress steward begins to rapidly read off the contents of his inventory list, his tongue moving impossibly quickly and leaving your head swirling in a daze of confusion.
Duchess Alorina brings her fist hurtling forward to slam into your jaw with a decidedly unladylike degree of force.
Swimming quickly around your body, a transparent cahno knocks you to the floor, leaving you rather dizzy and prone.
An Ulsyndar guard draws back his arm and impales your leg on his wickedly sharp spear. As he withdraws his dripping blade, the sickening scrape of metal on bone causes your stomach to turn.
An off-duty prison guard draws back his arm and impales your leg on his wickedly sharp spear. As he withdraws his dripping blade, the sickening scrape of metal on bone causes your stomach to turn.
A long tentacle reaches out to grab you, but you escape it at the last moment. As the tentacle passes by you it slams into your arm with a mighty force.

A Dralhuan guard removes three needles from a small container previously concealed within his clothes and pushes them deep into your flesh. As the needles rest beneath your skin, you begin feeling at ease.
Ryland slings a coil of rope from his shoulder and skilfully flings it at your legs, knocking you over and entangling your legs in the knots.
Kurgo, the Ursu chief swings a net over his head and throws it over you, entangling you.
Pulling a nearby lever, Nevon Talkar drops a thin sheet of netting across the chamber.
Tiamenjiara, the court conjuror gestures sharply at your feet and vines seem to grow from the ground, winding around your body and entangling you.
Telward slings a coil of rope from his shoulder and skilfully flings it at your legs, knocking you over and entangling your legs in the knots.
Chanting with a harsh whisper, an ominous lich lashes you with a series of spectral ropes before sending them to entangle your limbs.
Startled into action, the longest tentacles of a sea nettle wrap tightly around your legs to hinder your movement.
A House Feranki mage throws a piece of rope at you. In mid-air, it expands into a mesh of netting that contracts around you.

Damek, Feranki Magelord kneels and lays his huge hands flat on the ground, making circular motions in the dirt. A mass of thick, earthen tentacles rises from the ground to coil around you. You are ensnared!
Matteo, a marooned sailor spins around and throws his arms wide, casting a battered fishing net at you and entangling your limbs.
Flailing pathetically, a great grey slug attempts to cause you harm. Inadvertently, parts of your flesh become slick with slime.
A squat scrag flails at you meekly, leaving a trail of putrid algae clinging to your flesh.
Swinging his longsword at your head, a proud knight errant deals you a glancing blow across the temple.
Swinging his longsword at your head, a sturdy knight deals you a glancing blow across the temple.
An ursu man opens his mouth and lets out a mighty roar, making your ears ring and leaving you frazzled.
Sinking into a horse stance, a diligent monk punches you directly in the gut, forcing the air from your lungs.
Knight Commander Lord Ethran Rani brings the hilt of his broadsword down hard upon your head.
An Ulsyndar guard pivots quickly and smashes the haft of his spear into the side of your head, making your ears ring.
Stepping forward abruptly, a knight of the Siroccian Order slams his tower shield violently into you, knocking you to the ground and stunning you.
Expertly throwing you off balance with a kick to the chest, a proud ducal guard brings the butt of his sword slamming down on your skull in a fierce blow.
A bedraggled Ashtani foot soldier swings his shortsword above his head and brings the flat of the blade crashing down on your skull.
Commander Malrian Kyra brings the hilt of his broadsword down hard upon your head.
Commander Farista Errikale brings the hilt of his broadsword down hard upon your head.
Gripping the handle with both hands, Duke Semiro brings his mace crashing down on your head.
Sweeping his pickaxe in a wild arc, a blood-soaked dwarven miner catches your head a glancing blow with the thick, wooden shaft.
Powering his tail, a redfin tuna speeds towards your head, his body connecting with a force that leaves your ears ringing.

The Ur'Vampire Asztrik flicks his fingers in a rapid circular gesture. A swarm of screeching bats appears from nowhere, swerving and diving and sinking their tiny claws and fangs into any exposed areas, creating agonisingly painful wounds.
Feinting a jab, a sword spider outrider brings the hilt of his other sword towards you, stunning you with its forceful impact into your skull.
Raising herself up to her full height and glaring at you, an Arcadian noblewoman backhands you sharply in the mouth, stunning you.
A lost spirit begins to chant in a long-forgotten language, and you stumble backwards as pain tears through your skull.

Wreathing his hand in kai energy, a Tanjinn monk strikes the ground with a closed fist and a loud, piercing shout. A shockwave of pale blue ripples outwards from the point of impact, nearly throwing you to the ground.
With a fearsome neigh, a wild kelpie rears up and stomps two hooves into your head and torso.

A Brighthold watchman swings his arm around in a sweeping circle, slamming his lantern into your head. The lantern connects with a ferocious blow, stunning you momentarily and choking you with noxious fumes from the flame within.
With a fearful gasp, Kavan, the first mate grasps his ledger firmly and swings it wildly at your head, connecting with a thud.
Hard ice forms around the fist of a tundra mercenary as he punches you viciously in the temple.
Raising himself up to his full height and glaring at you, an Arcadian nobleman backhands you sharply in the mouth, stunning you.
Shouting a bone-chilling battlecry, a runic knight quickly rubs a dark, foul-smelling venom on his blade and swings it into your side with incredible force.
Grabbing two shovels from the ground, a golden malagma brings them crashing into your head from both sides.
A spinorthos gets a running start, slamming its head into your chest so hard you hear ribs crack.
Turning around abruptly, a rock beetle rears its hind legs and lashes out at you with its wickedly sharp, serrated claws.
Screaming an enraged battlecry, a Qurnok guard quickly slams his head against yours.
Sinking into a horse stance, a humble monk punches you directly in the gut, forcing the air from.
Sinking into a horse stance, a humble monk punches you directly in the gut, forcing the air from your lungs.

In a lighting quick move, Grandmaster Kevadrin comes behind you, grabs your head and quickly forces it towards your chest. You hear the bones in your neck crack and tendons pop as you lose consciousness.
Raising his metal-encased arm high into the air, Jeramun, the Flame of the World slams a gigantic fist down, knocking you solidly to the ground.
The dragon Yudhishthira unfurls his wings and beats them at the air. The gust sends you sprawling to the floor in a heap.
Hissing out a single word, Balai the Scorned conjures a mighty geyser of water that blasts you clean off your feet and sends you sprawling.
A domesticated water buffalo charges at you, sending you sprawling to the ground.
The staff in Jerak, Captain of the Guard's hands becomes a blur as he slams it into your head three times in rapid succession, then finishes with a vicious thrust to your chest.
The ground beneath you begins to shake and it sends all around it tumbling to the ground.
Hefting an impressive block of debris, a young worshipper brings it crashing down on your head.
Raising her hands to the sky, an Eleusian elementalist summons a mighty hailstorm upon you. The falling stones strike your head, leaving your mind scrambled.
Swinging his off-hand, an Ashtani corsair catches you on the temple with a tactless blow that leaves you struggling to think clearly.
Moving with precision, a runic knight quickly swings his broadsword at your head. Turning at the last instant, he brings the flat of his blade in contact with your skull, knocking you senseless.
An infernal wraith pulls back harshly on the reins of his steed, which rears back and kicks you powerfully in the forehead. Your mind swims as you reel from the blow.
As the liquid enters your system, you begin to feel your intelligence slowly drop.
His muscles heaving, a dwarf smith bashes you in the head with his hammer.
A humble monk step towards you, striking you directly under your chin with his staff. The blow causes your vision to swim and things become hazy.
Lord Adryn balls his fat hand into a fist and pounds it against the side of your head.
You fall back on your heels, feeling disoriented and strange.
A diligent monk step towards you, striking you directly under your chin with her staff. The blow causes your vision to swim and things become hazy.
Stepping smartly forward, a court constable twirls his baton before swinging it at your head. The sturdy wood connects solidly, and you reel dizzily from the blow.
A mad cackle echoes throughout the cavern as you are pounded repeatedly with a blunt object from an unseen assailant.
A stern monk step towards you, striking you directly under your chin with his staff. The blow causes your vision to swim and things become hazy.
Tossing his club aside, a massive wendigo grabs you with a vice-like grip and easily lifts you up, then brutally slams you into the ground.
The staff in Jerak, Captain of the Guard's hands becomes a blur as he slams it into your head three times in rapid succession, then finishes with a vicious thrust to your chest.
Xerafel lumbers toward you with surprising speed, and slits your throat viciously with a long, thin blade.
Vingar, the Mercenary Captain yells a roaring battle cry and advances towards you, an evil grin on his face. Panicked, you dive for cover.
Xulu, an orc witchdoctor bows his head and closes his eyes. After a moment, you feel your mind becoming entangled and twisted by his mental puissance.
Waving his appendages before your face, a tentacled polyp leaves a number of deep lacerations and manages to leave you transfixed.
A cloud of gnats flies about in stunning patterns, transfixing your attention.
A proud ducal guard whirls his blades in a shining nexus of glittering steel that seizes your attention and transfixes you utterly.
Encircling you with his large body, a large, albino centipede rapidly spins around you in a mesmerising display.
A giant sea serpent's teeth puncture through skin as he clamps down tightly, sending his venom coursing into you.
You watch in horror as a hooded man clamps his ebon teeth into your skin. You begin to sweat profusely as a sickly venom ebbs into your blood.
A Rhaan of Enuru draws a pair of blackened longswords, each dripping with a translucent liquid, and plunges them deep into your body.
Stretching her fingers outward, Erato, spirit of the Eastern Ithmia coaxes a tangle of vines and branches from the surrounding forest to hinder you.
An elite guardsman touches a web tattoo, and you are covered with sticky webs.
Issuing a garbled chant, a dwarf initiate points her warhammer at you and covers you with a sticky black film.
A large pulsating spider sprays you with a sticky webbing, which quickly entangles your limbs.
Long, translucent tentacles encircle your limbs as a monstrous skolef crushes the life from you.
Shadows suddenly coalesce and pull at you at Gloom, the Occultist's invocation.
Lashing out at your arms, Kimitia, a Quisalis apprentice wraps her whip around your wrists and pulls you hard to the ground.
Inish, the head cultist chants solemnly, weaving his hands and sending an entangling web of crimson magic over you.
A mass of sticky tendrils streak out from an enormous marsh ooze, wrapping you in a cocoon of slime.
Malvoc, the unholy reaches into the dark ether and pulls out a powerful soulspear, which he quickly sends flying into your torso.
An ugly tentacle lashes out from a hideous claw fiend and wraps around your torso, pulling you closer to its hideous form.
A battered Ashtani lieutenant makes a lunging stab at you with his longsword, impaling you to the hilt.
Frogtima the Prophetess spits at you with a corrosive glob of green goo.
Tightly grasping a lengthy cloth, Tickler, the tavernkeeper flicks it at you, whipping your chest and entangling you in the rag.
The Termite Queen opens her maw, unleashing a netting of saliva across the chamber.
Aiming her bow downwards, an apprentice assassin fires an arrow into your foot, pinning you to the ground.
Lashing out at your arms, Kimitia, a Quisalis Assassin wraps her whip around your wrists and pulls you hard to the ground.
An unkempt horse thief flings his whip in your direction and traps you in a painful mass of rope.

An ozhera chick concentrates his attention on you briefly before throwing two large rocks, which strike you hard in the chest.

A sleek dirangi leaps up into the air with blinding speed, bouncing nimbly off a wall before landing directly on top of you, knocking you to the floor.

Commander Kalesh roars, enraged, and charges headlong at you, his considerable bulk giving him enough momentum to send you sprawling to the floor.
Bellowing in rage, Commander Kalesh sweeps his axe in a wide arc, knocking down all who are in its way.
Sweeping his shovel through the furnace, a mhun smelter throws a shower of flaming coals at you.
return gmcp.Room.Info.area == "Tapoa Island"
With an enraged howl, a female ape grabs your legs and lifts you above her head, whirling you about before effortlessly tossing you into the underbrush.
Snapping his jaws ferociously, a scraggly dingo runs between your legs, causing you to fall and hit your head on a nearby rock.
Two terrible heads cackling rapaciously, the Vultubus lunges toward you, raising a leg to sink his deadly claws into your torso and stopping you in your tracks.
Charging toward you with a shriek, the Vultubus tramples over your body, pounding you into the ground with his massive weight.
return gmcp.Room.Info.area == "Tir Murann"
A Vertani guard sideswipes your ankle with the blunt end of his weapon, the force of the blow causing you to tumble to the ground.
Abruptly, you feel a stabbing pain in your chest before you feel yourself drift into sleep as a disembodied voice whispers, "Sleep, sleep..."
A sense of exhaustion suddenly overcomes you, causing you to take a nap.
An unseen being takes you to one side and whispers conspiratorially to you.
The Baalzadeen's terrible gaze turns to you, and utter terror floods your soul.
The daegger cuts through your skullcap-formed aura.
The daegger has looped around and dives toward your shadow, impaling it and you!
The unearthly screeching of the bloodworms disrupt your concentration.
Your flesh is set alight by the Baalzadeen.
Your mind feels somewhat slower and more plodding.

^Your (.+) defence has been stripped by \w+'s Baalzadeen\.$

svo.startedfighting("occultist", matches[2])
-- the affliction time is randomised after the actual line tempTimer(2, [[svo.valid.simpleunknownany(2)]])

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) lowers (?:her|his) eyes and an unearthly image appears before you\. Unable to accept what this vision means, your thoughts become jumbled\.$
^(\w+) speaks something in an unknown and impossible language\. Unable to process the alien images these words induce, your thoughts become jumbled\.$
You stumble slightly as
^You stumble slightly as \w+ touches your (left|right) leg, and it shrivels away\.$
You watch in horror as
^You watch in horror as \w+ touches your (right|left) arm, and it shrivels away to uselessness\.$
^\w+ utters a terrible curse and points a finger at you\.$
^\w+ sends an icy blue tendril of light that lashes out at you and wraps around you, sending a strange chill deep into your bones\.$
^(\w+) makes a sudden, quick gesture in front of you, almost hitting your nose\. (?:His|Her) hand glows with a vibrant violet light before snapping back to (?:her|his) side\.$
^(\w+) passes (?:his|her) hand in front of you\. You feel an invisible claw brush the back of your skull\.$

^(\w+) draws back with a knowing smirk and utters some alien word that vibrates deep within your bones\. Your mind swirls and body convulses in excruciating pain as your very spirit cries out in agony\.$
Seven rays of different coloured light spring out from
^Seven rays of different coloured light spring out from (\w+)'s outstretched hands, irradiating the location with blinding strobes\.$
^(\w+) makes a quick, sharp gesture toward you\.$
Its concussion wave slams into you, stunning you momentarily.
The explosion's concussion wave slams into you, stunning you momentarily.
A sudden itch drives you half-mad, and you scratch it furiously.
It throws strands of sticky webbing over you.
You slip and fall on a banana peel!
^\w+ does a back handspring to the \w+, striking you with (?:his|her) feet on the way out\.$

Trigger.name: Jack-in-the-Box start
Trigger.script:
if matches[3] ~= svo.me.name then return end
svo.givewarning({ initialmsg = string.format("%s started Jack-in-the-Box for you!", matches[2]), prefixwarning = matches[2].." Jack-in-the-Box you", startin = 1, duration = 2 })

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) sets a jack\-in\-the\-box on the ground and quickly winds it while whispering, '(\w+)\.' The cheerful music of a lute begins to emanate from it\.$

Trigger.name: Jack-in-the-Box two
Trigger.script:
if matches[2] ~= svo.me.name then return end
svo.givewarning({ initialmsg = string.format("Jack-in-the-Box about to %s you!!", ((math.random(2) == 1) and "nom" or "eat")), prefixwarning = matches[2].." Jack-in-the-Box you", startin = 1, duration = 2 })

regexCodeList.string: The music of the jack-in-the-box becomes faster and more frantic and a loud voice from within yells,
^The music of the jack\-in\-the\-box becomes faster and more frantic and a loud voice from within yells, "(\w+), I'm a-cooomiiiiing!"$
^\w+ slams into you, knocking you to the ground as (?:his|her) feet slam into your chest\.$
You pop it into your mouth, only to realise that someone slipped you a mickey!
^(\w+) reaches out and bops you on the nose with (?:her|his) blackjack\.$

Trigger.name: Steed Trample
Trigger.script: if svo.affl.blackout then svo.valid.simpleunknowncrippledlimb(4) -- if we weren't trampled, then we only apply once end

regexCodeList.string: ^\w+ whips .+ into a fury, bucking and racing dangerously in a circle, trampling the ground in a frenzy\.$
your left leg
your right leg
your left arm
your right arm
return isPrompt()

Trigger.name: Spores
Trigger.script: if svo.conf.breath and svo.conf.keepup and not svo.defkeepup[svo.defs.mode].breath then svo.defs.keepup("breath", true) end

regexCodeList.string: As you inhale the spores, you feel suddenly exhausted.

As you inhale the pollen, it clogs your lungs and you hack and cough.
The vines surrounding you suddenly lash out, whipping about you and entangling you.
A series of shockwaves jolts through you, knocking you flat to the ground.
A series of shockwaves jolts through you, knocking you further off balance.
A series of shockwaves jolts through you, toppling you off your mount onto your feet.

^A viper\-like sleizak rune suddenly extends from (?:the ground|a totem) to bite you painfully\.$

^Your limbs lock up in paralysis as you see an inguz rune on (?:the ground|a totem)\.$

svo.givewarning({ initialmsg = string.format("%s started Tzantza!", matches[2]), prefixwarning = matches[2].." started Tzantza", startin = 1, duration = 2 })
svo.startedfighting("shaman", matches[2])

Trigger.name: Gouge
Trigger.script:
svo.startedfighting("sentinel", matches[2])
if matches[3] then svo.valid.limb_hit(matches[3], "skirmish gouge") end
svo.valid.simplebleeding(50)

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) savagely gouges into you with .+?\.$
^(\w+) viciously gouges your (.+?) with .+?\.$
The blade of the weapon rakes sensitive lines of fire across your skin.

^You scrabble futilely at the ground as (\w+) drags your impaled body off to the \w+\.$
Terrible pain radiates from the weapon impaling you as
^Terrible pain radiates from the weapon impaling you as (\w+) gives it a violent twist\.$

Trigger.name: Doublestrike
Trigger.script:
svo.startedfighting("sentinel", matches[2])
if matches[3] then svo.valid.limb_hit(matches[3], "skirmish doublestrike") end

^(\w+) draws .+? in an expert lateral slice across your (.+?)\.$

Trigger.name: Doublestrike afflict
Trigger.script:
if not svo.affl.impatience then svo.valid.simpleimpatience() else svo.valid.simpleepilepsy() end
svo.startedfighting("sentinel", matches[2])

regexCodeList.string: ^Turning with the motion of (?:her|his) strike, (\w+) comes back around to slam the haft of (?:her|his) weapon into your temple\.$
^(\w+) locks (?:her|his) unnatural gaze to yours, and a terrible pressure begins to build behind your eyes\.$
Flames erupt over all over your body and begin to consume your flesh.
Your body stiffens rapidly with paralysis.
You are thrown from the room by the sheer force of the fiery blast.
The eyes of
^The eyes of (\w+) go out of focus for a moment as (?:her|his) mouth falls wide, a terrible, unearthly sound rippling forth\.$
The terrible sound strikes you as if a physical blow, throwing your equilibrium into disarray.
^(\w+) grows very still for a moment, before (?:her|his) eyes snap wide open and you feel something icy wrap about your limbs, binding you in place\.$
As your eyes come to rest on the ritual circle drawn about a tribal totem's base, you feel yourself abruptly locked in place.
Suddenly dizzy, you clutch your head and wonder what it was you were thinking about.
Your head spins as a sudden fit of dizziness overwhelms you.
Your mind feels slow and stupid suddenly.
Your spirit writhes in torment under the glare of the angel.
Your
^Your (.+) defence has been stripped by (\w+)'s guardian angel\.$
^(\w+)'s guardian angel's eyes glow like embers as searing heat pours over you, causing you to burst into flames\.$
^(\w+) utters a prayer and smites your (left|right) (arm|leg) with
It breaks with a loud 'CRACK'.

Trigger.name: Judgement one

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) raises .+ (m|M)ace over you to pass judgement on your sins, and it begins to crackle with righteous fire\.$

Trigger.name: Judgement two

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) swings the crackling mace about (?:his|her) head, gathering momentum as s?he bears down on you\.$

Trigger.name: Judgement three

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+)'s mace begins to make a high-pitched keening sound as it rapidly spins over (?:his|her) head\. You have only moments left to escape before you are judged!$
A guardian angel extends a hand in your direction, and a sudden impact knocks you from your feet.
You tumble to the ground as your leg abruptly gives out.
A feeling of great weariness overcomes you.
The ringing blow drives all sense of coordination from you.
Blood spurts and cartilage crunches as your face is rendered unrecognisable.
Your muscles lock up as the swift blows meet pressure points.
All thought of retaliation evaporates as pain blossoms from the withering blow.
You begin to doubt your vision as it swims and distorts.
Your thoughts scatter as clarity of mind deserts you.
Blocking out the agonising pain, you feel curiously detached from your body.
With rapid precision,
^With rapid precision, \w+ aims first a punch then a spearhand blow at two points on your chest\.$
The blow to your larynx leaves you coughing and gasping for breath.
All appetite leaves you as you resist the urge to be sick.
Profuse sweat slicks your skin in response to the underarm strike.
Icy vapour escapes from
^Icy vapour escapes from (\w+)'s clenched fist as s?he aims a blow towards you\.$
A thin rime of ice encases your body, numbing your extremities.
Sweltering heat hazes the air as
^Sweltering heat hazes the air as (\w+) lashes at you with a blazing fist\.$
Crackling flames erupt and surge across your skin in a frenzy.
^(?:His|Her) eyes dark and expression blank, (\w+) strikes you a hollow blow\.$
The emptiness of the void clutches at your soul.
Ducking behind you,
^Ducking behind you, (\w+) strikes at your hamstring with a rigid grip\.$
The crippling blow renders your leg insensate.
Moving with unpredictable grace,
^Moving with unpredictable grace, (\w+) sends a dancing blow towards you\.$
A sudden phantom wind seizes your mind, blurring the world into a shifting sea.
As
^As (\w+) draws \w+ \w+ from its scabbard, s?he drives the pommel into your chin\.$
Whispering a prayer to the
^Whispering a prayer to the \w+ winds, (\w+) draws \w+ \w+ and unleashes a slash towards your (.+)\.$
In a single motion,
^In a single motion, (\w+) draws \w+ \w+ from its scabbard and looses a vicious rising slash at your (.+)\.$
^(\w+) darts to your mount's flank in a rapid dash\. Grabbing your ankle and executing a graceful twist, s?he sends you tumbling from the saddle\.$
The ice-covered blade strips away your protective covering.

Trigger.name: Deathstrike
Trigger.script:
svo.givewarning({ initialmsg = string.format("%s started Deathstrike! Hinder %s or leave the room in 10s!", multimatches[2][2], multimatches[2][2]), prefixwarning = multimatches[2][2].." deathstriking you", startin = 1, duration = 2 })
svo.startedfighting("blademaster", multimatches[2][2])

regexCodeList.string: Fists clenched,
^Fists clenched, (\w+) focuses on you with a deadly look in (?:his|her) eyes\.$

Trigger.name: Deathstrike continued
Trigger.script:
svo.givewarning({ initialmsg = string.format("%s still deathstriking you! Hinder %s or leave the room in 5s!", multimatches[2][2], multimatches[2][2]), prefixwarning = multimatches[2][2].." deathstriking you still", startin = 1, duration = 2 })
svo.startedfighting("blademaster", multimatches[2][2])

Trigger.name: Limb damage
Trigger.script:
if not getLines(getLineNumber()-1, getLineNumber())[1]:find("%f[%a]you%f[%A]") then return end

Trigger.name: Puncture
Trigger.script: if svo.conf.aillusion and not (svo.enabledskills.vodun or svo.enabledskills.puppetry) then svo.ignore_illusion("Mildtrauma ignored - we don't seem to be fighting a Shaman or a Jester") else svo.valid.simplemildtrauma() end

Trigger.name: Displace start
Trigger.script:
svo.givewarning({ initialmsg = string.format("An alchemist started displacing you! Move rooms, or make the alchemist do something. 9s before getting moved"), prefixwarning = "getting displaced", startin = 1, duration = 2 })
local currentroom = gmcp.Room.Info.name
svo.displacerooms = svo.displacerooms or {} svo.displacerooms[#svo.displacerooms+1] = currentroom
--[[tempTimer(9+1, function() local i = table.index_of(svo.displacerooms, currentroom) if i then table.remove(svo.displacerooms, i) svo.echof(currentroom.." should be safe to move back into now.") end end)]]

Trigger.name: Started tumbling...
Trigger.script:
svo.boxDisplay("TUMBLING "..matches[2], "sea_green:yellow")
local time = 4.5
if (svo.affl.mangledrightleg or svo.affl.mutilatedrightleg) and (svo.affl.mangledleftleg or svo.affl.mutilatedleftleg) then time = 6.5 end
if svo.affl.timeflux then local brokenlimbs = svo.countbrokenlimbs()
if brokenlimbs == 4 then time = time + 2 elseif brokenlimbs > 0 then time = time + 1 end end
svo.tumbleTimer = tempTimer(time, [[ if svo.tumbleTimer then svo.boxDisplay("TUMBLE FAILED", "dark_slate_gray:red") svo.tumbleTimer = nil end ]])

Trigger.name: Somersault
Trigger.script:
svo.boxDisplay("SOMERSAULT "..matches[2], "sea_green:yellow")
local time = 3.5
if (svo.affl.mangledrightleg or svo.affl.mutilatedrightleg) and (svo.affl.mangledleftleg or svo.affl.mutilatedleftleg) then time = 5.5 end
if svo.affl.timeflux then local brokenlimbs = svo.countbrokenlimbs()
if brokenlimbs == 4 then time = time + 2 elseif brokenlimbs > 0 then time = time + 1 end end
svo.tumbleTimer = tempTimer(time, [[ if svo.tumbleTimer then svo.boxDisplay("SOMERSAULT FAILED", "dark_slate_gray:red") svo.tumbleTimer = nil end ]])

Trigger.name: Config view command separator

local separator = multimatches[3][2]
if separator == "None" then separator = '' end
svo.config.set("commandseparator", separator)
